She tried crocheting, which had been an enjoyable stress reliever in the past. This time, though, she would start projects, lose interest, and not finish them. Then she would take on a new project with renewed excitement, but within a few weeks she’d discard the new project too. She would make promises to her friends to get together, then cancel as the date approached, sometimes even on the day of the event. She even considered going back to work in her husband’s practice or returning to school for an advanced degree, but found reasons not to follow through on either. Her life remained reduced to housekeeping and church.
After Christina and I had spent about a year working with the parts of her that wanted her to find purpose and the parts that blocked or undermined her attempts, one day she arrived at my office bawling uncontrollably. She shared her awareness that she could never have a full life again until she came to terms with the loss of Kevin. This was the first time she had overtly acknowledged a connection between her son’s death and her lack of purpose, not to mention expressing willingness to work with the loss.	After Christina and I had spent about a year working with the parts of her that wanted her to find purpose and the parts that blocked or undermined her attempts, one day she arrived at my office bawling uncontrollably. She shared her awareness that she could never have a full life again until she came to terms with the loss of Kevin. This was the first time she had overtly acknowledged a connection between her son’s death and her lack of purpose, not to mention expressing willingness to work with the loss.	После того, как мы с Кристиной провели около года, работая с теми частями ее тела, которые хотели, чтобы она нашла цель, и частями, которые блокировали или срывали ее попытки, однажды она пришла в мой офис, бесконтрольно рыдая. Она поделилась своим пониманием того, что никогда больше не сможет жить полноценной жизнью, пока не смирится с потерей Кевина. Это был первый раз, когда она открыто признала связь между смертью сына и отсутствием у нее цели, не говоря уже о том, что выразила готовность работать с утратой.	After Christina and I had spent about a year working with the parts of her that wanted her to find purpose and the parts that blocked or undermined her attempts, one day she arrived at my office bawling uncontrollably. She shared her awareness that she could never have a full life again until she came to terms with the loss of Kevin. This was the first time she had overtly acknowledged a connection between her son’s death and her lack of purpose, not to mention expressing willingness to work with the loss.
What we discovered with Christina’s system was an alliance of parts working together to keep the pain of her son’s death out of her awareness. Some parts did this by keeping her focused on various ways to engage in life, while others undermined this engagement; some held the feelings of sadness, depression, and anger; others kept her hyper-focused on Evan’s life and the pain of her decreased involvement in it. In the year we worked together, the parts that wanted to keep the grief out of awareness had gradually learned to trust Christina, me, and the IFS process. After the day she came to session bawling with her newfound awareness, the path and pace of her treatment moved steadily forward. Christina now wanted to face her grief. She saw it as the key to her healing and to discovering new purpose.	What we discovered with Christina’s system was an alliance of parts working together to keep the pain of her son’s death out of her awareness. Some parts did this by keeping her focused on various ways to engage in life, while others undermined this engagement; some held the feelings of sadness, depression, and anger; others kept her hyper-focused on Evan’s life and the pain of her decreased involvement in it. In the year we worked together, the parts that wanted to keep the grief out of awareness had gradually learned to trust Christina, me, and the IFS process. After the day she came to session bawling with her newfound awareness, the path and pace of her treatment moved steadily forward. Christina now wanted to face her grief. She saw it as the key to her healing and to discovering new purpose.	С помощью системы Кристины мы обнаружили союз частей, работающих вместе, чтобы скрыть от ее сознания боль смерти ее сына. Некоторые части делали это, заставляя ее сосредоточиться на различных способах участия в жизни, тогда как другие подрывали эту вовлеченность; некоторые испытывали чувство печали, депрессии и гнева; другие заставляли ее чрезмерно сосредоточиться на жизни Эвана и на боли от ее меньшего участия в ней. За год нашей совместной работы те части, которые хотели скрыть горе от осознания, постепенно научились доверять Кристине, мне и процессу IFS. После того дня, когда она пришла на сеанс, рыдая от вновь обретенного осознания, путь и темп ее лечения неуклонно продвигались вперед. Кристина теперь хотела встретиться лицом к лицу со своим горем. Она видела в этом ключ к своему исцелению и открытию новой цели.	What we discovered with Christina’s system was an alliance of parts working together to keep the pain of her son’s death out of her awareness. Some parts did this by keeping her focused on various ways to engage in life, while others undermined this engagement; some held the feelings of sadness, depression, and anger; others kept her hyper-focused on Evan’s life and the pain of her decreased involvement in it. In the year we worked together, the parts that wanted to keep the grief out of awareness had gradually learned to trust Christina, me, and the IFS process. After the day she came to session bawling with her newfound awareness, the path and pace of her treatment moved steadily forward. Christina now wanted to face her grief. She saw it as the key to her healing and to discovering new purpose.
Here are some examples of how Christina came into relationship with her parts, using the qualities of Self to get to know each of them.	Here are some examples of how Christina came into relationship with her parts, using the qualities of Self to get to know each of them.	Вот несколько примеров того, как Кристина вступила в отношения со своими частями, используя качества Самости, чтобы узнать каждую из них.	Here are some examples of how Christina came into relationship with her parts, using the qualities of Self to get to know each of them.
Christina had several protectors who were grieving the loss of Kevin and managed their grief by keeping busy in various ways. She first came into a relationship with a part who presented her with options to keep busy, such as crocheting, connecting with friends, and going back to school or work. She was genuinely curious about the role of this part in her system. As she showed this part agenda-free curiosity, the part shared that it had to keep busy and distracted to keep from breaking down and to keep Christina safe from a pain so deep that she couldn’t possibly survive it. Christina appreciated this part’s care and protection; she expressed her compassion for how hard the part had been working and her appreciation of its efforts to keep her from deeper pain.	Christina had several protectors who were grieving the loss of Kevin and managed their grief by keeping busy in various ways. She first came into a relationship with a part who presented her with options to keep busy, such as crocheting, connecting with friends, and going back to school or work. She was genuinely curious about the role of this part in her system. As she showed this part agenda-free curiosity, the part shared that it had to keep busy and distracted to keep from breaking down and to keep Christina safe from a pain so deep that she couldn’t possibly survive it. Christina appreciated this part’s care and protection; she expressed her compassion for how hard the part had been working and her appreciation of its efforts to keep her from deeper pain.	У Кристины было несколько защитников, которые скорбели о потере Кевина и справлялись со своим горем, занимаясь разными делами. Сначала она вступила в отношения с частью, которая предлагала ей варианты, чем заняться, например, вязание крючком, общение с друзьями, возвращение в школу или на работу. Ей было искренне интересно узнать о роли этой части в ее системе. По мере того, как она демонстрировала этой части любопытство, свободное от повестки дня, часть поделилась, что ей нужно быть занятой и отвлекаться, чтобы не сломаться и уберечь Кристину от боли настолько глубокой, что она не сможет ее пережить. Кристина ценила заботу и защиту этой части; она выразила сочувствие тому, как усердно работала эта часть, и свою признательность за ее усилия уберечь ее от более глубокой боли.	Christina had several protectors who were grieving the loss of Kevin and managed their grief by keeping busy in various ways. She first came into a relationship with a part who presented her with options to keep busy, such as crocheting, connecting with friends, and going back to school or work. She was genuinely curious about the role of this part in her system. As she showed this part agenda-free curiosity, the part shared that it had to keep busy and distracted to keep from breaking down and to keep Christina safe from a pain so deep that she couldn’t possibly survive it. Christina appreciated this part’s care and protection; she expressed her compassion for how hard the part had been working and her appreciation of its efforts to keep her from deeper pain.
Next, we met a part carrying anger about the untimely death of Kevin. This part blamed everyone involved. It was critical and blamed Christina for letting the boys go boating that day without either parent present. It blamed the rescue crew for how long it took to pull Kevin out of the water. It blamed the EMTs for not getting him to the hospital fast enough. It blamed the hospital staff. Anyone who had encountered Kevin, directly or indirectly, was culpable and complicit in his death in the eyes of this part. There were other parts in Christina’s system that were afraid of this part’s fury, but she displayed courage in meeting the level of this part’s anger with a greater measure of calm. She also listened to the part’s sense of injustice at Kevin’s life being taken at such a young age. This part ultimately felt the connection between itself and Christina’s Self, and it felt seen and understood.	Next, we met a part carrying anger about the untimely death of Kevin. This part blamed everyone involved. It was critical and blamed Christina for letting the boys go boating that day without either parent present. It blamed the rescue crew for how long it took to pull Kevin out of the water. It blamed the EMTs for not getting him to the hospital fast enough. It blamed the hospital staff. Anyone who had encountered Kevin, directly or indirectly, was culpable and complicit in his death in the eyes of this part. There were other parts in Christina’s system that were afraid of this part’s fury, but she displayed courage in meeting the level of this part’s anger with a greater measure of calm. She also listened to the part’s sense of injustice at Kevin’s life being taken at such a young age. This part ultimately felt the connection between itself and Christina’s Self, and it felt seen and understood.	Далее мы встретили часть, несущую гнев по поводу безвременной смерти Кевина. Эта часть обвинила всех причастных. Это было критично и обвиняло Кристину в том, что она позволила мальчикам покататься на лодке в тот день без присутствия кого-либо из родителей. Он обвинил спасательную команду в том, как долго они вытаскивали Кевина из воды. Он обвинил медиков в том, что они не доставили его в больницу достаточно быстро. В этом виноват персонал больницы. Любой, кто сталкивался с Кевином, прямо или косвенно, был виновен и соучастник в его смерти в глазах этой части. В системе Кристины были и другие части, которые боялись ярости этой части, но она проявила смелость, встретив уровень гнева этой части с большей степенью спокойствия. Она также прислушивалась к ощущению несправедливости в отношении жизни Кевина, забранной в таком юном возрасте. Эта часть в конечном итоге почувствовала связь между собой и Самостью Кристины, почувствовала, что ее видят и понимают.	Next, we met a part carrying anger about the untimely death of Kevin. This part blamed everyone involved. It was critical and blamed Christina for letting the boys go boating that day without either parent present. It blamed the rescue crew for how long it took to pull Kevin out of the water. It blamed the EMTs for not getting him to the hospital fast enough. It blamed the hospital staff. Anyone who had encountered Kevin, directly or indirectly, was culpable and complicit in his death in the eyes of this part. There were other parts in Christina’s system that were afraid of this part’s fury, but she displayed courage in meeting the level of this part’s anger with a greater measure of calm. She also listened to the part’s sense of injustice at Kevin’s life being taken at such a young age. This part ultimately felt the connection between itself and Christina’s Self, and it felt seen and understood.
As we met and got to know more of Christina’s protectors, she made another connection: the connection between the loss of Kevin, the launching of Evan, and the death of her mother when Christina was 11. The part that her protectors most wanted to keep out of Christina’s awareness was the 11-year-old who hid her unbearable pain away to function in life.	As we met and got to know more of Christina’s protectors, she made another connection: the connection between the loss of Kevin, the launching of Evan, and the death of her mother when Christina was 11. The part that her protectors most wanted to keep out of Christina’s awareness was the 11-year-old who hid her unbearable pain away to function in life.	Когда мы встретились и узнали больше о защитниках Кристины, она установила еще одну связь: связь между потерей Кевина, увольнением Эвана и смертью ее матери, когда Кристине было 11 лет. Та часть, которую ее защитники больше всего хотели сохранить. вне поля зрения Кристины осталась 11-летняя девочка, которая скрывала свою невыносимую боль, чтобы жить нормальной жизнью.	As we met and got to know more of Christina’s protectors, she made another connection: the connection between the loss of Kevin, the launching of Evan, and the death of her mother when Christina was 11. The part that her protectors most wanted to keep out of Christina’s awareness was the 11-year-old who hid her unbearable pain away to function in life.
It was only through working with Christina’s fiercest protectors, the ones who managed her life through getting her haphazardly involved in new projects and activities, the one hyper-focused on Evan, and the one that held anger and rage, that we found the core trauma that connected it all: the loss of her mother. This pivotal loss was the blueprint for how Christina’s system organized itself around future losses. Her ability to engage her parts with the qualities of Self was the catalyst for the deeper healing that came later.	It was only through working with Christina’s fiercest protectors, the ones who managed her life through getting her haphazardly involved in new projects and activities, the one hyper-focused on Evan, and the one that held anger and rage, that we found the core trauma that connected it all: the loss of her mother. This pivotal loss was the blueprint for how Christina’s system organized itself around future losses. Her ability to engage her parts with the qualities of Self was the catalyst for the deeper healing that came later.	Только работая с самыми яростными защитниками Кристины, с теми, кто управлял ее жизнью, вовлекая ее в новые проекты и занятия, с теми, кто был чрезмерно сосредоточен на Эване, и с теми, кто сдерживал гнев и ярость, мы обнаружили основную травму. все это связывало: потеря матери. Эта ключевая потеря стала основой того, как система Кристины организовалась вокруг будущих потерь. Ее способность задействовать свои части с качествами Самости стала катализатором более глубокого исцеления, которое наступило позже.	It was only through working with Christina’s fiercest protectors, the ones who managed her life through getting her haphazardly involved in new projects and activities, the one hyper-focused on Evan, and the one that held anger and rage, that we found the core trauma that connected it all: the loss of her mother. This pivotal loss was the blueprint for how Christina’s system organized itself around future losses. Her ability to engage her parts with the qualities of Self was the catalyst for the deeper healing that came later.
Christina’s work befriending her parts and building relationships with them relaxed her protectors enough to reveal this younger part of her who carried the pain of her mother dying. It was working with this younger part, called an exile, that Christina was able to achieve deep healing, to redefine her relationship with Evan, fully grieve Kevin, and re-engage her life.	Christina’s work befriending her parts and building relationships with them relaxed her protectors enough to reveal this younger part of her who carried the pain of her mother dying. It was working with this younger part, called an exile, that Christina was able to achieve deep healing, to redefine her relationship with Evan, fully grieve Kevin, and re-engage her life.	Работа Кристины по подружке со своими частями и построению отношений с ними достаточно расслабила ее защитников, чтобы раскрыть эту младшую часть ее, которая перенесла боль умирающей матери. Именно работая с этой молодой частью, называемой изгнанницей, Кристина смогла достичь глубокого исцеления, переопределить свои отношения с Эваном, полностью оплакать Кевина и вновь начать свою жизнь.	Christina’s work befriending her parts and building relationships with them relaxed her protectors enough to reveal this younger part of her who carried the pain of her mother dying. It was working with this younger part, called an exile, that Christina was able to achieve deep healing, to redefine her relationship with Evan, fully grieve Kevin, and re-engage her life.
Meditation: Self Qualities	Meditation: Self Qualities	Медитация: Самокачества	Meditation: Self Qualities
Note: the majority of the meditations in this book were created with the guidance of my ancestors. I created this meditation and two others without ancestral input. The Self Qualities meditation uses affirmation and intentions to help you connect with the eight qualities of Self. Notice what happens in your system as each statement is heard. Some parts may not agree with the statements or may have a hard time with them. If this happens, notice what the parts are experiencing and make no attempt to change it.	Note: the majority of the meditations in this book were created with the guidance of my ancestors. I created this meditation and two others without ancestral input. The Self Qualities meditation uses affirmation and intentions to help you connect with the eight qualities of Self. Notice what happens in your system as each statement is heard. Some parts may not agree with the statements or may have a hard time with them. If this happens, notice what the parts are experiencing and make no attempt to change it.	Примечание: большинство медитаций в этой книге были созданы под руководством моих предков. Я создал эту медитацию и две другие без участия предков. Медитация «Самость» использует утверждения и намерения, чтобы помочь вам соединиться с восемью качествами «Я». Обратите внимание, что происходит в вашей системе, когда вы слышите каждое утверждение. Некоторые части могут не соглашаться с утверждениями или испытывать с ними трудности. Если это произойдет, обратите внимание на то, что испытывают детали, и не пытайтесь это изменить.	Note: the majority of the meditations in this book were created with the guidance of my ancestors. I created this meditation and two others without ancestral input. The Self Qualities meditation uses affirmation and intentions to help you connect with the eight qualities of Self. Notice what happens in your system as each statement is heard. Some parts may not agree with the statements or may have a hard time with them. If this happens, notice what the parts are experiencing and make no attempt to change it.
Close your eyes or soften your gaze.	Close your eyes or soften your gaze.	Закройте глаза или смягчите взгляд.	Close your eyes or soften your gaze.
Take note of your breath.	Take note of your breath.	Обратите внимание на свое дыхание.	Take note of your breath.
As you breathe, allow your awareness to take notice of each breath.	As you breathe, allow your awareness to take notice of each breath.	Когда вы дышите, позвольте своему сознанию замечать каждый вдох.	As you breathe, allow your awareness to take notice of each breath.
Notice any shifts as you breathe.	Notice any shifts as you breathe.	Обратите внимание на любые изменения во время дыхания.	Notice any shifts as you breathe.
Bring your attention to your breath as it enters your heart space.	Bring your attention to your breath as it enters your heart space.	Обратите внимание на свое дыхание, когда оно входит в пространство вашего сердца.	Bring your attention to your breath as it enters your heart space.
Focus on what you’re experiencing in your heart.	Focus on what you’re experiencing in your heart.	Сосредоточьтесь на том, что вы испытываете в своем сердце.	Focus on what you’re experiencing in your heart.
Do you notice warmth, tightness, a softening, tenderness? Is your heart space open or closed?	Do you notice warmth, tightness, a softening, tenderness? Is your heart space open or closed?	Замечаете ли вы тепло, стянутость, смягчение, нежность? Ваше сердечное пространство открыто или закрыто?	Do you notice warmth, tightness, a softening, tenderness? Is your heart space open or closed?
Be with what is present as you meditate on the intentions that follow. You may have parts that don’t agree or find these statements challenging. If this happens, just be with the parts to understand their concerns.	Be with what is present as you meditate on the intentions that follow. You may have parts that don’t agree or find these statements challenging. If this happens, just be with the parts to understand their concerns.	Будьте с тем, что присутствует, медитируя о последующих намерениях. У вас могут быть части, которые не согласуются друг с другом или которые кажутся вам спорными. Если это произойдет, просто будьте рядом с частями, чтобы понять их опасения.	Be with what is present as you meditate on the intentions that follow. You may have parts that don’t agree or find these statements challenging. If this happens, just be with the parts to understand their concerns.
I have compassion for myself that radiates out to others.	I have compassion for myself that radiates out to others.	У меня есть сострадание к себе, которое излучается на других.	I have compassion for myself that radiates out to others.
My creativity allows for free expression.	My creativity allows for free expression.	Моё творчество допускает свободное самовыражение.	My creativity allows for free expression.
I view situations and people with clarity.	I view situations and people with clarity.	Я смотрю на ситуации и людей ясно.	I view situations and people with clarity.
Calmness is the baseline from which I operate.	Calmness is the baseline from which I operate.	Спокойствие — это основа, от которой я действую.	Calmness is the baseline from which I operate.
I maintain connection with every part of myself.	I maintain connection with every part of myself.	Я поддерживаю связь с каждой частью себя.	I maintain connection with every part of myself.
I walk in the wonder of curiosity.	I walk in the wonder of curiosity.	Я иду в чуде любопытства.	I walk in the wonder of curiosity.
I have the courage to admit and accept when I am wrong.	I have the courage to admit and accept when I am wrong.	У меня есть смелость признать и принять свою неправоту.	I have the courage to admit and accept when I am wrong.
I have the confidence of knowing I am a worthwhile person no matter what is happening in my world.	I have the confidence of knowing I am a worthwhile person no matter what is happening in my world.	Я уверен, что знаю, что я достойный человек, независимо от того, что происходит в моем мире.	I have the confidence of knowing I am a worthwhile person no matter what is happening in my world.
I am Confident that there are Creative ways to Connect inside to witness my parts with Clarity, while remaining Calm and being Courageous enough to stay Curious when my parts get activated, remembering that a little Compassion goes a long way.	I am Confident that there are Creative ways to Connect inside to witness my parts with Clarity, while remaining Calm and being Courageous enough to stay Curious when my parts get activated, remembering that a little Compassion goes a long way.	Я Уверен, что существуют Творческие способы Соединиться внутри, чтобы с Ясностью наблюдать за своими частями, оставаясь при этом Спокойным и достаточно Смелым, чтобы оставаться Любопытным, когда мои части активируются, помня, что немного Сострадания имеет большое значение.	I am Confident that there are Creative ways to Connect inside to witness my parts with Clarity, while remaining Calm and being Courageous enough to stay Curious when my parts get activated, remembering that a little Compassion goes a long way.
Bring your awareness to your breath, and if it feels right, just breathe as you re-enter this moment and space.	Bring your awareness to your breath, and if it feels right, just breathe as you re-enter this moment and space.	Сосредоточьте свое внимание на своем дыхании, и, если оно кажется вам правильным, просто дышите, возвращаясь в этот момент и пространство.	Bring your awareness to your breath, and if it feels right, just breathe as you re-enter this moment and space.

Which ones do you want to live into?	Which ones do you want to live into?	В каких из них вы хотите жить?	Which ones do you want to live into?
Were there any intentions you found difficult or challenging to relate to?	Were there any intentions you found difficult or challenging to relate to?	Были ли какие-либо намерения, которые вам было трудно или сложно реализовать?	Were there any intentions you found difficult or challenging to relate to?
Did any part become activated?	Did any part become activated?	Какая-то часть активировалась?	Did any part become activated?
Which parts keep you from living into the intentions you’d like to?	Which parts keep you from living into the intentions you’d like to?	Что мешает вам жить в соответствии с желаемыми намерениями?	Which parts keep you from living into the intentions you’d like to?
When a part gets activated, which intentions can you lean in to?	When a part gets activated, which intentions can you lean in to?	Когда какая-то часть активируется, на какие намерения вы можете опереться?	When a part gets activated, which intentions can you lean in to?

CHAPTER 5	CHAPTER 5	ГЛАВА 5	CHAPTER 5
Be With	Be With	Быть с	Be With
Encouraging Parts to Separate from You	Encouraging Parts to Separate from You	Поощрение частей отделиться от вас	Encouraging Parts to Separate from You
I can’t catch my breath. The pain in my chest is excruciating. It feels like someone is taking a sledgehammer to my ribcage from the inside and also like my heart is in a vise grip. I’m certain I will pass out. If I don’t die from falling and hitting my head on the shower tile, this pain in my chest will take me out. The more I try to breathe, the tighter the grip on my heart. I’m sweating profusely. The pace of my heartbeat reaches a dizzying speed that causes nausea. I start to believe this is how my life ends, here in the shower, naked and defenseless. My brain tells me to call out to my husband for help, but trying to speak is met with a twisting chest pain that steals my words. The hot steam of the shower is suffocating. I am immobilized except for the tears flowing down my face. My internal temperature skyrockets, and the dizziness intensifies. The inevitable is about to happen. I hold the shower wall to steady myself. Just before I pass out, a thought flashes, “You’ve experienced this before. Panic. You’re not going to pass out or die. This is a panic attack.”	I can’t catch my breath. The pain in my chest is excruciating. It feels like someone is taking a sledgehammer to my ribcage from the inside and also like my heart is in a vise grip. I’m certain I will pass out. If I don’t die from falling and hitting my head on the shower tile, this pain in my chest will take me out. The more I try to breathe, the tighter the grip on my heart. I’m sweating profusely. The pace of my heartbeat reaches a dizzying speed that causes nausea. I start to believe this is how my life ends, here in the shower, naked and defenseless. My brain tells me to call out to my husband for help, but trying to speak is met with a twisting chest pain that steals my words. The hot steam of the shower is suffocating. I am immobilized except for the tears flowing down my face. My internal temperature skyrockets, and the dizziness intensifies. The inevitable is about to happen. I hold the shower wall to steady myself. Just before I pass out, a thought flashes, “You’ve experienced this before. Panic. You’re not going to pass out or die. This is a panic attack.”	Я не могу отдышаться. Боль в груди невыносимая. Такое ощущение, будто кто-то бьет кувалдой по моей грудной клетке изнутри, а также как будто мое сердце зажато в тисках. Я уверен, что потеряю сознание. Если я не умру от падения и удара головой о плитку в душе, эта боль в груди выведет меня из строя. Чем больше я пытаюсь дышать, тем сильнее сжимается мое сердце. Я сильно потею. Скорость моего сердцебиения достигает головокружительной скорости, вызывающей тошноту. Я начинаю верить, что именно так и заканчивается моя жизнь — здесь, в душе, обнаженная и беззащитная. Мой мозг говорит мне позвать мужа на помощь, но попытка заговорить сопровождается скручивающей болью в груди, которая крадет мои слова. Горячий пар душа удушает. Я обездвижен, если не считать слез, текущих по моему лицу. Моя внутренняя температура резко возрастает, а головокружение усиливается. Неизбежное вот-вот произойдет. Я держусь за стенку душа, чтобы устоять. Прежде чем я теряю сознание, у меня мелькает мысль: «Ты уже сталкивался с этим раньше. Паника. Ты не потеряешь сознание и не умрешь. Это паническая атака».	I can’t catch my breath. The pain in my chest is excruciating. It feels like someone is taking a sledgehammer to my ribcage from the inside and also like my heart is in a vise grip. I’m certain I will pass out. If I don’t die from falling and hitting my head on the shower tile, this pain in my chest will take me out. The more I try to breathe, the tighter the grip on my heart. I’m sweating profusely. The pace of my heartbeat reaches a dizzying speed that causes nausea. I start to believe this is how my life ends, here in the shower, naked and defenseless. My brain tells me to call out to my husband for help, but trying to speak is met with a twisting chest pain that steals my words. The hot steam of the shower is suffocating. I am immobilized except for the tears flowing down my face. My internal temperature skyrockets, and the dizziness intensifies. The inevitable is about to happen. I hold the shower wall to steady myself. Just before I pass out, a thought flashes, “You’ve experienced this before. Panic. You’re not going to pass out or die. This is a panic attack.”
I hear a compassionately soft voice say, “I can be with you and support you if you make room for me. Let me be with you.” My body responds with shortness of breath and blurred vision. The voice continues in soft tones of a whisper, “I’m here with you; you’re not alone. You don’t have to do this by yourself.” The voice seems a million miles away, and I desperately want to believe it. As it repeats itself several times, I am able to deepen my inhales and slow my exhales. Each time I do, the voice is clearer and closer. However, the pain in my chest and rapid heartbeat remain the same. My right hand moves to my heart, affirming that I am not alone, which slows my breath further. Next, I hear the voice say, “That’s good, keep with the full breaths.” The panic continues to abate. The voice goes on to say, “I’m with you. You’re okay. Just breathe.”	I hear a compassionately soft voice say, “I can be with you and support you if you make room for me. Let me be with you.” My body responds with shortness of breath and blurred vision. The voice continues in soft tones of a whisper, “I’m here with you; you’re not alone. You don’t have to do this by yourself.” The voice seems a million miles away, and I desperately want to believe it. As it repeats itself several times, I am able to deepen my inhales and slow my exhales. Each time I do, the voice is clearer and closer. However, the pain in my chest and rapid heartbeat remain the same. My right hand moves to my heart, affirming that I am not alone, which slows my breath further. Next, I hear the voice say, “That’s good, keep with the full breaths.” The panic continues to abate. The voice goes on to say, “I’m with you. You’re okay. Just breathe.”	Я слышу сострадательный мягкий голос, говорящий: «Я могу быть с тобой и поддержать тебя, если ты уступишь мне место. Позволь мне быть с тобой». Мое тело реагирует одышкой и помутнением зрения. Голос продолжает мягким шепотом: «Я здесь с тобой; ты не одинок. Вам не обязательно делать это самостоятельно». Кажется, голос находится за миллион миль, и мне отчаянно хочется в это поверить. Поскольку это повторяется несколько раз, я могу углубить вдох и замедлить выдох. С каждым разом голос становится все отчетливее и ближе. Однако боль в груди и учащенное сердцебиение остались прежними. Моя правая рука приближается к сердцу, подтверждая, что я не один, что еще больше замедляет мое дыхание. Затем я слышу, как голос говорит: «Это хорошо, продолжайте дышать полной грудью». Паника продолжает стихать. Голос продолжает говорить: «Я с тобой. Ты в порядке. Просто дыши».	I hear a compassionately soft voice say, “I can be with you and support you if you make room for me. Let me be with you.” My body responds with shortness of breath and blurred vision. The voice continues in soft tones of a whisper, “I’m here with you; you’re not alone. You don’t have to do this by yourself.” The voice seems a million miles away, and I desperately want to believe it. As it repeats itself several times, I am able to deepen my inhales and slow my exhales. Each time I do, the voice is clearer and closer. However, the pain in my chest and rapid heartbeat remain the same. My right hand moves to my heart, affirming that I am not alone, which slows my breath further. Next, I hear the voice say, “That’s good, keep with the full breaths.” The panic continues to abate. The voice goes on to say, “I’m with you. You’re okay. Just breathe.”
Now I (Self) have clarity that I’m speaking with Antsy as she is experiencing sheer panic. Being recognized by me, Antsy turns down the intensity of the chest pain and slightly slows the heartbeat. I (Self) thank Antsy for reducing the intensity of the bodily sensations. My hand remains on my heart as she unblends from me, and I can now be with her.	Now I (Self) have clarity that I’m speaking with Antsy as she is experiencing sheer panic. Being recognized by me, Antsy turns down the intensity of the chest pain and slightly slows the heartbeat. I (Self) thank Antsy for reducing the intensity of the bodily sensations. My hand remains on my heart as she unblends from me, and I can now be with her.	Теперь у меня (Я) есть ясность в том, что я говорю с Энси, поскольку она испытывает настоящую панику. Узнанный мной, Антси снижает интенсивность боли в груди и немного замедляет сердцебиение. Я (Сам) благодарю Antsy за снижение интенсивности телесных ощущений. Моя рука остается на моем сердце, когда она отделяется от меня, и теперь я могу быть с ней.	Now I (Self) have clarity that I’m speaking with Antsy as she is experiencing sheer panic. Being recognized by me, Antsy turns down the intensity of the chest pain and slightly slows the heartbeat. I (Self) thank Antsy for reducing the intensity of the bodily sensations. My hand remains on my heart as she unblends from me, and I can now be with her.
IFS CONCEPT 1: BLENDING	IFS CONCEPT 1: BLENDING	КОНЦЕПЦИЯ IFS 1: СМЕШИВАНИЕ	IFS CONCEPT 1: BLENDING
The way parts embody our systems is called blending. In the experience I’ve just shared, I was blended with Antsy. She took over my system, and her primary expression was in intense bodily sensations of shortness of breath, accelerated heart rate, chest pains, nausea, dizziness, panting, and blurred vision. When blending happens, access to our Self-energy is minimized. The part that is blended is in the seat of consciousness, and we experience the part as ourselves in totality, not as separate from us or a part of us. When Antsy was blended with my Self in this moment, I experienced her as me.	The way parts embody our systems is called blending. In the experience I’ve just shared, I was blended with Antsy. She took over my system, and her primary expression was in intense bodily sensations of shortness of breath, accelerated heart rate, chest pains, nausea, dizziness, panting, and blurred vision. When blending happens, access to our Self-energy is minimized. The part that is blended is in the seat of consciousness, and we experience the part as ourselves in totality, not as separate from us or a part of us. When Antsy was blended with my Self in this moment, I experienced her as me.	Способ, которым части воплощают наши системы, называется смешиванием. В опыте, которым я только что поделился, меня смешали с Antsy. Она взяла на себя управление моей системой, и ее основным проявлением были интенсивные телесные ощущения одышки, учащенного пульса, болей в груди, тошноты, головокружения, одышки и помутнения зрения. Когда происходит смешение, доступ к нашей собственной энергии сводится к минимуму. Смешанная часть находится в месте сознания, и мы воспринимаем эту часть как самих себя во всей полноте, а не как отдельную от нас или как часть нас. Когда в этот момент Анси слилась с моим Я, я ощутил ее как себя.	The way parts embody our systems is called blending. In the experience I’ve just shared, I was blended with Antsy. She took over my system, and her primary expression was in intense bodily sensations of shortness of breath, accelerated heart rate, chest pains, nausea, dizziness, panting, and blurred vision. When blending happens, access to our Self-energy is minimized. The part that is blended is in the seat of consciousness, and we experience the part as ourselves in totality, not as separate from us or a part of us. When Antsy was blended with my Self in this moment, I experienced her as me.
Parts blend with us as a way of communicating. When we are blended, the extreme feelings, thoughts, and beliefs of the part are what we experience. Antsy used my body to express her fear through intense somatic symptoms, which felt like dying.	Parts blend with us as a way of communicating. When we are blended, the extreme feelings, thoughts, and beliefs of the part are what we experience. Antsy used my body to express her fear through intense somatic symptoms, which felt like dying.	Части сливаются с нами как способ общения. Когда мы смешаны, мы испытываем крайние чувства, мысли и убеждения этой части. Энси использовала мое тело, чтобы выразить свой страх через сильные соматические симптомы, которые ощущались как смерть.	Parts blend with us as a way of communicating. When we are blended, the extreme feelings, thoughts, and beliefs of the part are what we experience. Antsy used my body to express her fear through intense somatic symptoms, which felt like dying.
Blending is a way parts express their needs. Although she didn’t come right out and ask for what she needed, Antsy’s fear was an indication of an unmet need. I later came to know she needed safety, connection, and to be understood. In Chapter 6, I talk about how to get to know our parts by befriending them.	Blending is a way parts express their needs. Although she didn’t come right out and ask for what she needed, Antsy’s fear was an indication of an unmet need. I later came to know she needed safety, connection, and to be understood. In Chapter 6, I talk about how to get to know our parts by befriending them.	Смешение — это способ, которым части выражают свои потребности. Хотя она не вышла прямо и не попросила о том, что ей нужно, страх Энси был признаком неудовлетворенной потребности. Позже я понял, что ей нужна безопасность, связь и понимание. В главе 6 я рассказываю о том, как узнать наши части, подружившись с ними.	Blending is a way parts express their needs. Although she didn’t come right out and ask for what she needed, Antsy’s fear was an indication of an unmet need. I later came to know she needed safety, connection, and to be understood. In Chapter 6, I talk about how to get to know our parts by befriending them.
IFS CONCEPT 2: UNBLENDING	IFS CONCEPT 2: UNBLENDING	КОНЦЕПЦИЯ IFS 2: РАЗЪЕДИНЕНИЕ	IFS CONCEPT 2: UNBLENDING
Before we can get to know a part, the part must first unblend. When a part is in the seat of consciousness, we are that part. There is no separation between us and the part. Unblending is how parts create separation. We want parts to separate because this increases Self-energy and allows Self to come into relationship with the part. The part cannot be known if it is alone. The part needs to experience and be supported by Self to be heard, understood, and validated. Unblending allows Self to get to know the part. However, the part must unblend from Self, not the other way around; Self cannot drive the unblending. It must be the part’s choice and the part’s actions that cause unblending to happen. With unblending, the system shifts from being led by the part to Self-leadership.	Before we can get to know a part, the part must first unblend. When a part is in the seat of consciousness, we are that part. There is no separation between us and the part. Unblending is how parts create separation. We want parts to separate because this increases Self-energy and allows Self to come into relationship with the part. The part cannot be known if it is alone. The part needs to experience and be supported by Self to be heard, understood, and validated. Unblending allows Self to get to know the part. However, the part must unblend from Self, not the other way around; Self cannot drive the unblending. It must be the part’s choice and the part’s actions that cause unblending to happen. With unblending, the system shifts from being led by the part to Self-leadership.	Прежде чем мы сможем узнать часть, часть должна сначала рассоединиться. Когда часть находится в месте сознания, мы являемся этой частью. Между нами и частью нет разделения. Растворение — это то, как части создают разделение. Мы хотим, чтобы части разделились, потому что это увеличивает энергию «Я» и позволяет «Я» вступить во взаимоотношения с частью. Часть не может быть познана, если она одна. Эта часть должна получить опыт и поддержку со стороны «Я», чтобы быть услышанной, понятой и подтвержденной. Растворение позволяет «Я» узнать эту часть. Однако часть должна отделиться от Я, а не наоборот; «Я» не может управлять несмешиванием. Это должен быть выбор части и ее действия, которые приводят к неслиянию. При несмешивании система переходит от руководства части к самолидерству.	Before we can get to know a part, the part must first unblend. When a part is in the seat of consciousness, we are that part. There is no separation between us and the part. Unblending is how parts create separation. We want parts to separate because this increases Self-energy and allows Self to come into relationship with the part. The part cannot be known if it is alone. The part needs to experience and be supported by Self to be heard, understood, and validated. Unblending allows Self to get to know the part. However, the part must unblend from Self, not the other way around; Self cannot drive the unblending. It must be the part’s choice and the part’s actions that cause unblending to happen. With unblending, the system shifts from being led by the part to Self-leadership.
In the story I just shared, the unblending process begins with Antsy, when Self reminds her that she has experienced these feelings in the past, names them as a panic attack, and reassures her that she is not going to die. Self goes on to request that Antsy make space for Self to support her so she doesn’t have to be alone. Notice that Antsy doesn’t completely unblend at the first request; she doesn’t need to. Self just needs some separation to happen. Enough space is made that Self can continue to support Antsy by being present and reminding her over and over that she is not alone.	In the story I just shared, the unblending process begins with Antsy, when Self reminds her that she has experienced these feelings in the past, names them as a panic attack, and reassures her that she is not going to die. Self goes on to request that Antsy make space for Self to support her so she doesn’t have to be alone. Notice that Antsy doesn’t completely unblend at the first request; she doesn’t need to. Self just needs some separation to happen. Enough space is made that Self can continue to support Antsy by being present and reminding her over and over that she is not alone.	В истории, которой я только что поделился, процесс разделения начинается с Antsy, когда Селф напоминает ей, что она испытывала эти чувства в прошлом, называет их панической атакой и заверяет ее, что она не умрет. Далее Селф просит, чтобы Энси освободила место для Селфа, чтобы поддержать ее, чтобы ей не приходилось оставаться одной. Обратите внимание, что Antsy не полностью разделяется по первому требованию; ей это не нужно. «Я» просто нужно некоторое разделение, чтобы произошло. Освобождено достаточно места, чтобы Селф мог продолжать поддерживать Анси, присутствуя и снова и снова напоминая ей, что она не одна.	In the story I just shared, the unblending process begins with Antsy, when Self reminds her that she has experienced these feelings in the past, names them as a panic attack, and reassures her that she is not going to die. Self goes on to request that Antsy make space for Self to support her so she doesn’t have to be alone. Notice that Antsy doesn’t completely unblend at the first request; she doesn’t need to. Self just needs some separation to happen. Enough space is made that Self can continue to support Antsy by being present and reminding her over and over that she is not alone.
I have found that my parts respond well to physical connection, so one of the techniques my Self uses to calm my parts when they become dysregulated is touch. To assist Antsy in regulating, Self places its right hand over Antsy’s fast-beating heart, deepening the connection between the two while creating a stabilizing presence for Antsy. The physical connection allows Antsy to slow her heart rate and encourages her to unblend further, giving Self greater presence in the system. Once that happens, Self can support and begin to get to know Antsy, understand the reason for the panic, and address her needs.	I have found that my parts respond well to physical connection, so one of the techniques my Self uses to calm my parts when they become dysregulated is touch. To assist Antsy in regulating, Self places its right hand over Antsy’s fast-beating heart, deepening the connection between the two while creating a stabilizing presence for Antsy. The physical connection allows Antsy to slow her heart rate and encourages her to unblend further, giving Self greater presence in the system. Once that happens, Self can support and begin to get to know Antsy, understand the reason for the panic, and address her needs.	Я обнаружил, что мои части хорошо реагируют на физическое соединение, поэтому один из методов, которые мое Я использует, чтобы успокоить мои части, когда они теряют регуляцию, — это прикосновение. Чтобы помочь Антси в регулировании, Селф кладет правую руку на быстро бьющееся сердце Антси, углубляя связь между ними и создавая стабилизирующее присутствие Антси. Физическая связь позволяет Энси замедлить частоту сердечных сокращений и побуждает ее еще больше расслабиться, что дает Селф большее присутствие в системе. Как только это произойдет, Селф сможет поддержать Анси и начать знакомиться с ней, понять причину паники и удовлетворить ее потребности.	I have found that my parts respond well to physical connection, so one of the techniques my Self uses to calm my parts when they become dysregulated is touch. To assist Antsy in regulating, Self places its right hand over Antsy’s fast-beating heart, deepening the connection between the two while creating a stabilizing presence for Antsy. The physical connection allows Antsy to slow her heart rate and encourages her to unblend further, giving Self greater presence in the system. Once that happens, Self can support and begin to get to know Antsy, understand the reason for the panic, and address her needs.
IFS CONCEPT 3: WHEN A PART DOESN’T UNBLEND	IFS CONCEPT 3: WHEN A PART DOESN’T UNBLEND	КОНЦЕПЦИЯ IFS 3: КОГДА ЧАСТЬ НЕ РАЗЪЕДИНЯЕТСЯ	IFS CONCEPT 3: WHEN A PART DOESN’T UNBLEND
Some parts have a difficult time unblending. Even Antsy unblended only partially at first; her breathing slowed while her chest pains and rapid heartbeat persisted. However, there was enough separation for her to have awareness of Self. If Antsy had not responded to Self’s support to unblend, that would have alerted Self that while gripped in a terrifying experience, Antsy was also afraid to separate. Self would have asked her, “What are you afraid would happen if you separated?” The primary fear parts have about separating is that I will somehow be harmed or something worse than what they are doing (in this case causing a panic attack) will happen to me. The parts’ job is to keep me safe. If a part is afraid of losing its job, we first want to validate its importance in the system, then let the part know that we are not trying to get rid of it but want to get to know it, emphasizing that we cannot get to know it unless it allows us to be with it.	Some parts have a difficult time unblending. Even Antsy unblended only partially at first; her breathing slowed while her chest pains and rapid heartbeat persisted. However, there was enough separation for her to have awareness of Self. If Antsy had not responded to Self’s support to unblend, that would have alerted Self that while gripped in a terrifying experience, Antsy was also afraid to separate. Self would have asked her, “What are you afraid would happen if you separated?” The primary fear parts have about separating is that I will somehow be harmed or something worse than what they are doing (in this case causing a panic attack) will happen to me. The parts’ job is to keep me safe. If a part is afraid of losing its job, we first want to validate its importance in the system, then let the part know that we are not trying to get rid of it but want to get to know it, emphasizing that we cannot get to know it unless it allows us to be with it.	Некоторые части трудно разъединить. Даже Antsy поначалу разделился лишь частично; ее дыхание замедлилось, но боли в груди и учащенное сердцебиение сохранялись. Однако ей было достаточно разделения, чтобы осознать Себя. Если бы Энси не отреагировал на поддержку Селфа в разделении, это насторожило бы Селфа, что, несмотря на ужасающий опыт, Антси также боится отделиться. Селф спросил бы ее: «Чего ты боишься, если бы вы расстались?» Основной страх, который части испытывают по поводу разделения, заключается в том, что мне каким-то образом причинят вред или что со мной случится что-то худшее, чем то, что они делают (в данном случае вызывающее паническую атаку). Задача частей — обеспечить мою безопасность. Если часть боится потерять свою работу, мы сначала хотим подтвердить ее важность в системе, а затем дать понять части, что мы не пытаемся избавиться от нее, а хотим с ней познакомиться, подчеркивая, что мы не можем добраться до нее. знать это, если только это не позволяет нам быть с ним.	Some parts have a difficult time unblending. Even Antsy unblended only partially at first; her breathing slowed while her chest pains and rapid heartbeat persisted. However, there was enough separation for her to have awareness of Self. If Antsy had not responded to Self’s support to unblend, that would have alerted Self that while gripped in a terrifying experience, Antsy was also afraid to separate. Self would have asked her, “What are you afraid would happen if you separated?” The primary fear parts have about separating is that I will somehow be harmed or something worse than what they are doing (in this case causing a panic attack) will happen to me. The parts’ job is to keep me safe. If a part is afraid of losing its job, we first want to validate its importance in the system, then let the part know that we are not trying to get rid of it but want to get to know it, emphasizing that we cannot get to know it unless it allows us to be with it.
Protectors are diligent in their roles and do not want the system to experience the pain of the vulnerable parts they protect. They fear that if they separate, we will feel the intense feelings of worthlessness, not being good enough, or shame. If this is the part’s fear, Self can ask the vulnerable part not to overwhelm the system with its intense feelings and beliefs while Self is getting to know it, and if the vulnerable part does express with intensity, Self can let the part know that Self only needs to experience a small amount of what it’s feeling in order to understand. The main messages in addressing the protector’s fears are that the protector controls the process, and it can come back to protect at any time. Letting the protector know that Self is not trying to change it or get rid of it allows it to relax and increases its willingness to unblend.	Protectors are diligent in their roles and do not want the system to experience the pain of the vulnerable parts they protect. They fear that if they separate, we will feel the intense feelings of worthlessness, not being good enough, or shame. If this is the part’s fear, Self can ask the vulnerable part not to overwhelm the system with its intense feelings and beliefs while Self is getting to know it, and if the vulnerable part does express with intensity, Self can let the part know that Self only needs to experience a small amount of what it’s feeling in order to understand. The main messages in addressing the protector’s fears are that the protector controls the process, and it can come back to protect at any time. Letting the protector know that Self is not trying to change it or get rid of it allows it to relax and increases its willingness to unblend.	Защитники добросовестно выполняют свою роль и не хотят, чтобы система испытывала боль от уязвимых частей, которые они защищают. Они боятся, что, если они расстанутся, мы испытаем сильное чувство никчемности, недостаточной доброты или стыда. Если это страх части, «Я» может попросить уязвимую часть не перегружать систему своими сильными чувствами и убеждениями, пока «Я» знакомится с ней, и если уязвимая часть действительно выражает это с интенсивностью, «Я» может дать части знать, что «Я» ему нужно лишь немного испытать то, что он чувствует, чтобы понять. Основные идеи в борьбе со страхами защитника заключаются в том, что защитник контролирует процесс и может вернуться, чтобы защитить в любой момент. Если дать защитнику понять, что «Я» не пытается его изменить или избавиться от него, это позволит ему расслабиться и усилит его готовность расстаться.	Protectors are diligent in their roles and do not want the system to experience the pain of the vulnerable parts they protect. They fear that if they separate, we will feel the intense feelings of worthlessness, not being good enough, or shame. If this is the part’s fear, Self can ask the vulnerable part not to overwhelm the system with its intense feelings and beliefs while Self is getting to know it, and if the vulnerable part does express with intensity, Self can let the part know that Self only needs to experience a small amount of what it’s feeling in order to understand. The main messages in addressing the protector’s fears are that the protector controls the process, and it can come back to protect at any time. Letting the protector know that Self is not trying to change it or get rid of it allows it to relax and increases its willingness to unblend.
When the part’s fears are sufficiently addressed and the part unblends, Self can notice any changes in thoughts, beliefs, emotions, and/or bodily sensations. Sometimes as our parts give space, the way they express themselves changes. In the opening story, Antsy’s activation calmed more and more as her fear of dying was attended to. Acknowledge the change, and if the change provides relief, offer gratitude. Once the part unblends, let it know that you want to understand its experiences and get to know it better.	When the part’s fears are sufficiently addressed and the part unblends, Self can notice any changes in thoughts, beliefs, emotions, and/or bodily sensations. Sometimes as our parts give space, the way they express themselves changes. In the opening story, Antsy’s activation calmed more and more as her fear of dying was attended to. Acknowledge the change, and if the change provides relief, offer gratitude. Once the part unblends, let it know that you want to understand its experiences and get to know it better.	Когда страхи части достаточно устранены и часть растворяется, «Я» может заметить любые изменения в мыслях, убеждениях, эмоциях и/или телесных ощущениях. Иногда, когда наши части дают пространство, меняется способ их самовыражения. Во вступительной истории активация Антси все больше и больше успокаивалась по мере того, как ее страх смерти был устранен. Признайте изменение, и если оно принесет облегчение, выразите благодарность. Как только часть распадется, дайте ей понять, что вы хотите понять ее переживания и узнать ее получше.	When the part’s fears are sufficiently addressed and the part unblends, Self can notice any changes in thoughts, beliefs, emotions, and/or bodily sensations. Sometimes as our parts give space, the way they express themselves changes. In the opening story, Antsy’s activation calmed more and more as her fear of dying was attended to. Acknowledge the change, and if the change provides relief, offer gratitude. Once the part unblends, let it know that you want to understand its experiences and get to know it better.
When parts are blended, they believe they are you. They have no awareness of a Self who can support them and handle what they believe you cannot. The key to helping our parts is assisting them to unblend. Self cannot make a part unblend; that is the part’s choice, but Self can encourage the process. Parts are usually willing to unblend after they experience some quality of Self-energy. When the part separates, Self can be with the part. When parts refuse to separate, exploring and addressing their fears related to unblending is necessary. Until their fears are adequately addressed, parts will not feel safe enough to unblend.	When parts are blended, they believe they are you. They have no awareness of a Self who can support them and handle what they believe you cannot. The key to helping our parts is assisting them to unblend. Self cannot make a part unblend; that is the part’s choice, but Self can encourage the process. Parts are usually willing to unblend after they experience some quality of Self-energy. When the part separates, Self can be with the part. When parts refuse to separate, exploring and addressing their fears related to unblending is necessary. Until their fears are adequately addressed, parts will not feel safe enough to unblend.	Когда части смешиваются, они верят, что они — это вы. Они не осознают Я, которое может поддержать их и справиться с тем, с чем, по их мнению, вы не можете справиться. Ключ к помощи нашим частям — помочь им рассоединиться. «Я» не может заставить часть соединиться; это выбор части, но «Я» может стимулировать этот процесс. Части обычно готовы рассоединиться после того, как они испытают некоторое качество Само-энергии. Когда часть отделяется, Я может быть с этой частью. Когда части отказываются разделяться, необходимо изучить и устранить их страхи, связанные с разъединением. Пока их страхи не будут адекватно устранены, части не будут чувствовать себя в достаточной безопасности, чтобы разделиться.	When parts are blended, they believe they are you. They have no awareness of a Self who can support them and handle what they believe you cannot. The key to helping our parts is assisting them to unblend. Self cannot make a part unblend; that is the part’s choice, but Self can encourage the process. Parts are usually willing to unblend after they experience some quality of Self-energy. When the part separates, Self can be with the part. When parts refuse to separate, exploring and addressing their fears related to unblending is necessary. Until their fears are adequately addressed, parts will not feel safe enough to unblend.
Meditation: Be With	Meditation: Be With	Медитация: Будь с	Meditation: Be With
Note: This is a meditation created without the direct assistance of my ancestors.	Note: This is a meditation created without the direct assistance of my ancestors.	Примечание: эта медитация создана без непосредственной помощи моих предков.	Note: This is a meditation created without the direct assistance of my ancestors.
The Be With meditation highlights the importance of parts unblending as essential to building relationship with parts and healing them. It also shows how being aware of what it’s like in our system when we’re blended with a part, versus when we’re not, builds trust between Self and parts as parts get to experience being known by Self and knowing Self.	The Be With meditation highlights the importance of parts unblending as essential to building relationship with parts and healing them. It also shows how being aware of what it’s like in our system when we’re blended with a part, versus when we’re not, builds trust between Self and parts as parts get to experience being known by Self and knowing Self.	Медитация «Быть ​​с» подчеркивает важность разделения частей как необходимого для построения отношений с частями и их исцеления. Это также показывает, как осознание того, что происходит в нашей системе, когда мы смешаны с частью, а не когда мы не смешаны, укрепляет доверие между «Я» и частями, поскольку части получают опыт того, что они познаны «Я» и познают «Я».	The Be With meditation highlights the importance of parts unblending as essential to building relationship with parts and healing them. It also shows how being aware of what it’s like in our system when we’re blended with a part, versus when we’re not, builds trust between Self and parts as parts get to experience being known by Self and knowing Self.
This meditation allows you to experience being blended, unblending, and experiencing the difference between being a part and being with a part.	This meditation allows you to experience being blended, unblending, and experiencing the difference between being a part and being with a part.	Эта медитация позволяет вам ощутить слияние и расслоение, а также почувствовать разницу между тем, чтобы быть частью и быть с частью.	This meditation allows you to experience being blended, unblending, and experiencing the difference between being a part and being with a part.
Take a moment to get comfortable.	Take a moment to get comfortable.	Найдите минутку, чтобы почувствовать себя комфортно.	Take a moment to get comfortable.
Close your eyes or soften your gaze.	Close your eyes or soften your gaze.	Закройте глаза или смягчите взгляд.	Close your eyes or soften your gaze.
Take note of your breath.	Take note of your breath.	Обратите внимание на свое дыхание.	Take note of your breath.
As you breathe, allow your awareness to follow the breath.	As you breathe, allow your awareness to follow the breath.	Когда вы дышите, позвольте своему сознанию следовать за дыханием.	As you breathe, allow your awareness to follow the breath.
Continue to follow your breath to help you settle.	Continue to follow your breath to help you settle.	Продолжайте следить за своим дыханием, чтобы успокоиться.	Continue to follow your breath to help you settle.
Bring to mind a situation that recently activated one of your parts.	Bring to mind a situation that recently activated one of your parts.	Вспомните ситуацию, которая недавно активировала одну из ваших частей.	Bring to mind a situation that recently activated one of your parts.
It could be a disagreement you had with someone, a situation that caused annoyance, disbelief, anger, or anything else.	It could be a disagreement you had with someone, a situation that caused annoyance, disbelief, anger, or anything else.	Это может быть разногласие с кем-то, ситуация, вызвавшая раздражение, недоверие, гнев или что-то еще.	It could be a disagreement you had with someone, a situation that caused annoyance, disbelief, anger, or anything else.
Allow the part to embody as if the situation is occurring now.	Allow the part to embody as if the situation is occurring now.	Позвольте этой части воплотиться так, как будто ситуация происходит сейчас.	Allow the part to embody as if the situation is occurring now.
What do you notice?	What do you notice?	Что вы заметили?	What do you notice?
What emotions are you experiencing?	What emotions are you experiencing?	Какие эмоции вы испытываете?	What emotions are you experiencing?
What bodily sensations are present?	What bodily sensations are present?	Какие телесные ощущения присутствуют?	What bodily sensations are present?
What are you saying?	What are you saying?	Что вы говорите?	What are you saying?
What do you believe about the situation or person?	What do you believe about the situation or person?	Что вы думаете о ситуации или человеке?	What do you believe about the situation or person?
What are your thoughts?	What are your thoughts?	Каковы ваши мысли?	What are your thoughts?
Let whatever is coming up completely embody you, and stay with what you’re experiencing.	Let whatever is coming up completely embody you, and stay with what you’re experiencing.	Позвольте всему, что происходит, полностью воплотить вас и оставайтесь с тем, что вы испытываете.	Let whatever is coming up completely embody you, and stay with what you’re experiencing.
Ask the part to separate from you. It can do so by:	Ask the part to separate from you. It can do so by:	Попросите часть отделиться от вас. Это может быть сделано путем:	Ask the part to separate from you. It can do so by:
Stepping outside of you slightly.	Stepping outside of you slightly.	Немного выйдя за пределы тебя.	Stepping outside of you slightly.
Sitting next to you.	Sitting next to you.	Сидя рядом с тобой.	Sitting next to you.
Decreasing its emotions.	Decreasing its emotions.	Уменьшение своих эмоций.	Decreasing its emotions.
Turning down the intensity of body sensations.	Turning down the intensity of body sensations.	Уменьшение интенсивности телесных ощущений.	Turning down the intensity of body sensations.
If the part unblends, notice what it feels likes to be separate from the part.	If the part unblends, notice what it feels likes to be separate from the part.	Если часть распадается, обратите внимание на то, каково это быть отделенным от части.	If the part unblends, notice what it feels likes to be separate from the part.
Just be with the part in this separate and connected state.	Just be with the part in this separate and connected state.	Просто будьте с частью в этом отдельном и связанном состоянии.	Just be with the part in this separate and connected state.
If the part does not unblend, ask, “What are you afraid will happen if you separate?”	If the part does not unblend, ask, “What are you afraid will happen if you separate?”	Если часть не разделяется, спросите: «Чего вы боитесь, если вы разделитесь?»	If the part does not unblend, ask, “What are you afraid will happen if you separate?”
Listen to the part’s fears.	Listen to the part’s fears.	Прислушайтесь к страхам части.	Listen to the part’s fears.
Address any fears the part shares with you.	Address any fears the part shares with you.	Устраните любые страхи, которые часть разделяет с вами.	Address any fears the part shares with you.
After addressing the part’s fears, ask it to separate now.	After addressing the part’s fears, ask it to separate now.	Разобравшись со страхами части, попросите ее отделиться прямо сейчас.	After addressing the part’s fears, ask it to separate now.
If it separates now, notice what you feel.	If it separates now, notice what you feel.	Если он сейчас отделится, обратите внимание на то, что вы чувствуете.	If it separates now, notice what you feel.
If it still doesn’t unblend, continue to identify and address its fears.	If it still doesn’t unblend, continue to identify and address its fears.	Если он все еще не расстается, продолжайте выявлять его страхи и устранять их.	If it still doesn’t unblend, continue to identify and address its fears.
If your part did unblend, continue to be with the part.	If your part did unblend, continue to be with the part.	Если ваша часть распалась, продолжайте быть с ней.	If your part did unblend, continue to be with the part.
Take note of the difference between the part being blended and now unblended.	Take note of the difference between the part being blended and now unblended.	Обратите внимание на разницу между частью, которую смешивают, и частью, которую теперь не смешивают.	Take note of the difference between the part being blended and now unblended.
How do you feel toward the part in this unblended state?	How do you feel toward the part in this unblended state?	Как вы относитесь к роли в этом несмешанном состоянии?	How do you feel toward the part in this unblended state?
If you feel one of the qualities of Self-energy, send that energy to the part.	If you feel one of the qualities of Self-energy, send that energy to the part.	Если вы чувствуете одно из качеств Само-энергии, направьте эту энергию в эту часть.	If you feel one of the qualities of Self-energy, send that energy to the part.
How does the part respond to the Self-energy?	How does the part respond to the Self-energy?	Как эта часть реагирует на собственную энергию?	How does the part respond to the Self-energy?
Set an intention to come back to your part at a later time.	Set an intention to come back to your part at a later time.	Установите намерение вернуться к своей части позже.	Set an intention to come back to your part at a later time.
Thank your part. If it was able to separate, thank it for doing so.	Thank your part. If it was able to separate, thank it for doing so.	Спасибо с вашей стороны. Если он смог отделиться, поблагодарите его за это.	Thank your part. If it was able to separate, thank it for doing so.
If it was not able to separate, thank it for sharing its fears with you.	If it was not able to separate, thank it for sharing its fears with you.	Если он не смог отделиться, поблагодарите его за то, что он поделился с вами своими страхами.	If it was not able to separate, thank it for sharing its fears with you.
Bring your awareness to your breath, and when it feels right, re-enter this moment and space by slowly opening your eyes when you’re ready.	Bring your awareness to your breath, and when it feels right, re-enter this moment and space by slowly opening your eyes when you’re ready.	Сосредоточьте свое внимание на своем дыхании, и, когда оно почувствует себя нужным, снова войдите в этот момент и пространство, медленно открывая глаза, когда будете готовы.	Bring your awareness to your breath, and when it feels right, re-enter this moment and space by slowly opening your eyes when you’re ready.
Exercise 1: Journal Capture	Exercise 1: Journal Capture	Упражнение 1. Ведение журнала	Exercise 1: Journal Capture
Journal what you would like to capture from this meditation, like a revelation, reflection, or anything significant you want to remember from this experience.	Journal what you would like to capture from this meditation, like a revelation, reflection, or anything significant you want to remember from this experience.	Запишите то, что вы хотели бы уловить в результате этой медитации, например, откровение, размышление или что-то важное, что вы хотите запомнить из этого опыта.	Journal what you would like to capture from this meditation, like a revelation, reflection, or anything significant you want to remember from this experience.
Exercise 2: Be With Journal Questions	Exercise 2: Be With Journal Questions	Упражнение 2: Будьте с вопросами журнала	Exercise 2: Be With Journal Questions
After you’ve done the Be With meditation and written your quick Journal Capture, take some time to explore more deeply by responding to the following journal prompts.	After you’ve done the Be With meditation and written your quick Journal Capture, take some time to explore more deeply by responding to the following journal prompts.	После того, как вы выполнили медитацию «Быть ​​с» и написали свой быстрый дневник, потратьте некоторое время на более глубокое изучение, отвечая на следующие подсказки журнала.	After you’ve done the Be With meditation and written your quick Journal Capture, take some time to explore more deeply by responding to the following journal prompts.
Describe the activating situation or person.	Describe the activating situation or person.	Опишите активирующую ситуацию или человека.	Describe the activating situation or person.
What was your experience of being blended with your part? Emotions	What was your experience of being blended with your part? Emotions	Каков был ваш опыт слияния со своей ролью? Эмоции	What was your experience of being blended with your part? Emotions
Bodily sensations	Bodily sensations	Телесные ощущения	Bodily sensations
What the part said	What the part said	Что сказала часть	What the part said
Beliefs	Beliefs	Убеждения	Beliefs
Thoughts	Thoughts	Мысли	Thoughts
Anything else	Anything else	Что-нибудь еще	Anything else
How did your part respond to being asked to unblend?	How did your part respond to being asked to unblend?	Как ваша часть отреагировала на просьбу разделиться?	How did your part respond to being asked to unblend?
If your part did unblend, what did you experience after it separated from you?	If your part did unblend, what did you experience after it separated from you?	Если ваша часть разделилась, что вы испытали после того, как она отделилась от вас?	If your part did unblend, what did you experience after it separated from you?
If your part did not unblend, what were its fears?	If your part did not unblend, what were its fears?	Если ваша часть не разделилась, чего она опасалась?	If your part did not unblend, what were its fears?
How did your part respond to Self-energy?	How did your part respond to Self-energy?	Как ваша часть отреагировала на Самоэнергию?	How did your part respond to Self-energy?
What intentions did you set with your part?	What intentions did you set with your part?	Какие намерения вы поставили перед собой?	What intentions did you set with your part?
Exercise 3: Activation Practice	Exercise 3: Activation Practice	Упражнение 3: Практика активации	Exercise 3: Activation Practice
This exercise helps to notice parts in real time and to unblend them in the moments of activation. Being with parts will assist in developing relationship and trust between them and Self.	This exercise helps to notice parts in real time and to unblend them in the moments of activation. Being with parts will assist in developing relationship and trust between them and Self.	Это упражнение помогает замечать части в реальном времени и разъединять их в моменты активации. Общение с частями поможет развитию отношений и доверия между ними и Собой.	This exercise helps to notice parts in real time and to unblend them in the moments of activation. Being with parts will assist in developing relationship and trust between them and Self.
Over the next week, check in with the part from the meditation daily.	Over the next week, check in with the part from the meditation daily.	В течение следующей недели ежедневно проверяйте часть медитации.	Over the next week, check in with the part from the meditation daily.
Pay attention to when this part is present.	Pay attention to when this part is present.	Обратите внимание, когда эта часть присутствует.	Pay attention to when this part is present.
Track the situations and/or people that activate this part in your daily life.	Track the situations and/or people that activate this part in your daily life.	Отслеживайте ситуации и/или людей, которые активируют эту часть вашей повседневной жизни.	Track the situations and/or people that activate this part in your daily life.
When this part is present, ask it to unblend so you can be with it in its activation.	When this part is present, ask it to unblend so you can be with it in its activation.	Когда эта часть присутствует, попросите ее рассоединиться, чтобы вы могли быть с ней в ее активации.	When this part is present, ask it to unblend so you can be with it in its activation.
Journal about your experience with this part daily and what you learned.	Journal about your experience with this part daily and what you learned.	Ежедневно записывайте свой опыт работы с этой частью и то, что вы узнали.	Journal about your experience with this part daily and what you learned.
CHAPTER 6	CHAPTER 6	ГЛАВА 6	CHAPTER 6
Crystal Cave with the Ancestors	Crystal Cave with the Ancestors	Хрустальная пещера с предками	Crystal Cave with the Ancestors
Building Relationships with Your Parts	Building Relationships with Your Parts	Построение отношений с вашими частями	Building Relationships with Your Parts
In the last chapter, we met my part Antsy. We learned of her struggle to unblend, as she thought she was alone and had no awareness of Self. She was eventually able to unblend, and now we pick up her story from her separated state as Self befriends her.	In the last chapter, we met my part Antsy. We learned of her struggle to unblend, as she thought she was alone and had no awareness of Self. She was eventually able to unblend, and now we pick up her story from her separated state as Self befriends her.	В последней главе мы встретили мою роль Анси. Мы узнали о ее борьбе за то, чтобы отделиться, поскольку она думала, что одинока и не осознает себя. В конце концов она смогла расстаться, и теперь мы продолжаем ее историю из ее разделенного состояния, когда Селф подружился с ней.	In the last chapter, we met my part Antsy. We learned of her struggle to unblend, as she thought she was alone and had no awareness of Self. She was eventually able to unblend, and now we pick up her story from her separated state as Self befriends her.
The first thing I do after Antsy unblends is extend compassion toward her. I want her to experience what I feel for her. I extend curiosity too, because I am genuinely interested in the root of her panicked state. I begin to deepen our connection by silently being with Antsy, with my hand on my heart, allowing her to feel my presence with her.	The first thing I do after Antsy unblends is extend compassion toward her. I want her to experience what I feel for her.
