When that is complete, the two of you move through the fourth inner circle, slowing your place a bit, and the Ancestor says, “Courage,” and shows you how you have been courageous in small and not-so-small ways. How you have stood up for yourself or others.	Когда это будет завершено, вы двое двигаетесь через четвертый внутренний круг, немного замедляя свое место, и Предок говорит: «Мужество» и показывает вам, как вы проявляли смелость в маленьких и не очень маленьких проявлениях. Как вы постояли за себя или других.	When that is complete, the two of you move through the fourth inner circle, slowing your place a bit, and the Ancestor says, “Courage,” and shows you how you have been courageous in small and not-so-small ways. How you have stood up for yourself or others.
Next you walk the fifth inner circle of Curiosity. The Ancestor shows you times from your life when you engaged others with genuine interest in the triumphs and challenges of their lives. Notice how your curiosity encouraged others to open to share with you.	Next you walk the fifth inner circle of Curiosity. The Ancestor shows you times from your life when you engaged others with genuine interest in the triumphs and challenges of their lives. Notice how your curiosity encouraged others to open to share with you.	Далее вы проходите пятый внутренний круг Curiosity. «Предок» показывает вам моменты из вашей жизни, когда вы с искренним интересом привлекали других к победам и испытаниям их жизни. Обратите внимание, как ваше любопытство побудило других открыться и поделиться с вами.	Next you walk the fifth inner circle of Curiosity. The Ancestor shows you times from your life when you engaged others with genuine interest in the triumphs and challenges of their lives. Notice how your curiosity encouraged others to open to share with you.
Walking deeper into the labyrinth, the Ancestor says, “Confidence,” and commences to show you examples of this quality from childhood to now.	Walking deeper into the labyrinth, the Ancestor says, “Confidence,” and commences to show you examples of this quality from childhood to now.	Проходя глубже в лабиринт, Предок говорит: «Уверенность» и начинает показывать вам примеры этого качества из детства и по сей день.	Walking deeper into the labyrinth, the Ancestor says, “Confidence,” and commences to show you examples of this quality from childhood to now.
The circles have gotten much shorter to walk. The Ancestor says, “Clarity,” and you visualize the people and life situations when you knew exactly what to do or say without judgment.	The circles have gotten much shorter to walk. The Ancestor says, “Clarity,” and you visualize the people and life situations when you knew exactly what to do or say without judgment.	Круги стали намного короче. Предок говорит: «Ясность», и вы визуализируете людей и жизненные ситуации, когда вы точно знали, что делать или говорить, без осуждения.	The circles have gotten much shorter to walk. The Ancestor says, “Clarity,” and you visualize the people and life situations when you knew exactly what to do or say without judgment.
You and the Ancestor arrive at the centermost part of the labyrinth, where you find a bench.	You and the Ancestor arrive at the centermost part of the labyrinth, where you find a bench.	Вы и Предок доберетесь до центральной части лабиринта, где найдете скамейку.	You and the Ancestor arrive at the centermost part of the labyrinth, where you find a bench.
The Ancestor invites you to sit with them to watch how you have lived the final quality of Connectedness. You see connections from the past and the ones you have now. See if you can notice connections with other ancestors.	The Ancestor invites you to sit with them to watch how you have lived the final quality of Connectedness. You see connections from the past and the ones you have now. See if you can notice connections with other ancestors.	Предок приглашает вас сесть с ними и посмотреть, как вы прожили последнее качество Связности. Вы видите связи из прошлого и те, которые у вас есть сейчас. Посмотрите, сможете ли вы заметить связи с другими предками.	The Ancestor invites you to sit with them to watch how you have lived the final quality of Connectedness. You see connections from the past and the ones you have now. See if you can notice connections with other ancestors.
The Ancestor tells you it is time to travel back through the labyrinth and adds that you will discover tokens or gifts representing each quality of Self as you walk back to the beginning. The Ancestor goes on to say, “Each gift reflects how your qualities show up, and they are yours to take with you.” The Ancestor hands you a container to collect your gifts.	The Ancestor tells you it is time to travel back through the labyrinth and adds that you will discover tokens or gifts representing each quality of Self as you walk back to the beginning. The Ancestor goes on to say, “Each gift reflects how your qualities show up, and they are yours to take with you.” The Ancestor hands you a container to collect your gifts.	Предок сообщает вам, что пришло время вернуться через лабиринт, и добавляет, что по мере возвращения к началу вы обнаружите жетоны или дары, представляющие каждое качество «Я». Далее Предок говорит: «Каждый подарок отражает то, как проявляются ваши качества, и вы можете взять их с собой». Предок вручает вам контейнер для сбора ваших даров.	The Ancestor tells you it is time to travel back through the labyrinth and adds that you will discover tokens or gifts representing each quality of Self as you walk back to the beginning. The Ancestor goes on to say, “Each gift reflects how your qualities show up, and they are yours to take with you.” The Ancestor hands you a container to collect your gifts.
Accompanied by the Ancestor, you look around this inner space for your token of Connectedness. When you find it, you place it in the container.	Accompanied by the Ancestor, you look around this inner space for your token of Connectedness. When you find it, you place it in the container.	В сопровождении Предка вы осматриваете это внутреннее пространство в поисках своего знака Связности. Когда вы его найдете, вы поместите его в контейнер.	Accompanied by the Ancestor, you look around this inner space for your token of Connectedness. When you find it, you place it in the container.
Walking the next circle, you find the Clarity token. Before placing it in the container, acknowledge why you selected it.	Walking the next circle, you find the Clarity token. Before placing it in the container, acknowledge why you selected it.	Пройдя следующий круг, вы найдете жетон Ясности. Прежде чем поместить его в контейнер, поймите, почему вы выбрали его.	Walking the next circle, you find the Clarity token. Before placing it in the container, acknowledge why you selected it.
As you circle again, the gift representing Confidence is discovered, and you take it with you.	As you circle again, the gift representing Confidence is discovered, and you take it with you.	Когда вы снова кружите, вы обнаруживаете дар, символизирующий Уверенность, и берете его с собой.	As you circle again, the gift representing Confidence is discovered, and you take it with you.
Walking around, you come across your Curiosity keepsake. Take note of your selection before putting it away.	Walking around, you come across your Curiosity keepsake. Take note of your selection before putting it away.	Прогуливаясь, вы натыкаетесь на свой сувенир Curiosity. Обратите внимание на свой выбор, прежде чем убрать его.	Walking around, you come across your Curiosity keepsake. Take note of your selection before putting it away.
Entering the next turn, you see the memento for Courage. Hold it in your hand; admire what it looks like.	Entering the next turn, you see the memento for Courage. Hold it in your hand; admire what it looks like.	Войдя в следующий ход, вы увидите сувенир за отвагу. Держите его в руке; полюбуйтесь, как это выглядит.	Entering the next turn, you see the memento for Courage. Hold it in your hand; admire what it looks like.
The time to walk each circle increases as you locate and pick up the heirloom of Calm.	The time to walk each circle increases as you locate and pick up the heirloom of Calm.	Время прохождения каждого круга увеличивается по мере того, как вы находите и поднимаете реликвию Спокойствия.	The time to walk each circle increases as you locate and pick up the heirloom of Calm.
Next, you discover the Creativity gift.	Next, you discover the Creativity gift.	Далее вы открываете для себя дар творчества.	Next, you discover the Creativity gift.
Walking the outermost circle, you come upon the gift representing Compassion.	Walking the outermost circle, you come upon the gift representing Compassion.	Пройдя по внешнему кругу, вы находите дар, символизирующий Сострадание.	Walking the outermost circle, you come upon the gift representing Compassion.
When the two of you arrive back at the entrance of the labyrinth, you both take time to admire the collected gifts of Self and their importance in your journey forward.	When the two of you arrive back at the entrance of the labyrinth, you both take time to admire the collected gifts of Self and their importance in your journey forward.	Когда вы двое вернетесь ко входу в лабиринт, вы оба найдёте время, чтобы полюбоваться собранными дарами «Я» и их важностью для вашего путешествия вперёд.	When the two of you arrive back at the entrance of the labyrinth, you both take time to admire the collected gifts of Self and their importance in your journey forward.
The Ancestor says, “Everyone has these qualities, but each person’s expression of these gifts is unique. The most important thing about these gifts is you’ve always had them, and they are meant to be shared.”	The Ancestor says, “Everyone has these qualities, but each person’s expression of these gifts is unique. The most important thing about these gifts is you’ve always had them, and they are meant to be shared.”	Предок говорит: «У каждого есть эти качества, но выражение этих даров у каждого человека уникально. Самое главное в этих дарах то, что они всегда были у вас, и ими нужно делиться».	The Ancestor says, “Everyone has these qualities, but each person’s expression of these gifts is unique. The most important thing about these gifts is you’ve always had them, and they are meant to be shared.”
Take the time you need to end your time with the Ancestor, knowing you can meet with them whenever you please.	Take the time you need to end your time with the Ancestor, knowing you can meet with them whenever you please.	Найдите время, необходимое для того, чтобы покончить с Предком, зная, что вы можете встретиться с ним, когда захотите.	Take the time you need to end your time with the Ancestor, knowing you can meet with them whenever you please.
Bring your awareness to your breath and just breathe as you re-enter this moment and space. Slowly open your eyes when you are ready.	Bring your awareness to your breath and just breathe as you re-enter this moment and space. Slowly open your eyes when you are ready.	Сосредоточьте свое внимание на своем дыхании и просто дышите, возвращаясь в этот момент и пространство. Медленно откройте глаза, когда будете готовы.	Bring your awareness to your breath and just breathe as you re-enter this moment and space. Slowly open your eyes when you are ready.
Exercise 1: Journal Capture	Exercise 1: Journal Capture	Упражнение 1. Ведение журнала	Exercise 1: Journal Capture
Journal what you would like to capture from this meditation, like a revelation, reflection, or anything significant you want to remember from this experience.	Journal what you would like to capture from this meditation, like a revelation, reflection, or anything significant you want to remember from this experience.	Запишите то, что вы хотели бы уловить в результате этой медитации, например, откровение, размышление или что-то важное, что вы хотите запомнить из этого опыта.	Journal what you would like to capture from this meditation, like a revelation, reflection, or anything significant you want to remember from this experience.
Exercise 2: Labyrinth with the Ancestor Journal Questions	Exercise 2: Labyrinth with the Ancestor Journal Questions	Упражнение 2: Лабиринт с вопросами о журнале предков	Exercise 2: Labyrinth with the Ancestor Journal Questions
After you’ve done the Labyrinth with the Ancestor meditation and written your quick Journal Capture, take some time to explore more deeply by responding to the following journal prompts.	After you’ve done the Labyrinth with the Ancestor meditation and written your quick Journal Capture, take some time to explore more deeply by responding to the following journal prompts.	После того, как вы прошли Лабиринт с медитацией Предка и написали быстрый «Захват журнала», потратьте некоторое время на более глубокое исследование, ответив на следующие подсказки журнала.	After you’ve done the Labyrinth with the Ancestor meditation and written your quick Journal Capture, take some time to explore more deeply by responding to the following journal prompts.
What gift did you receive for each of the qualities of Self, and what is the significance of that gift?	What gift did you receive for each of the qualities of Self, and what is the significance of that gift?	Какой дар вы получили за каждое из качеств своего «Я» и каково значение этого дара?	What gift did you receive for each of the qualities of Self, and what is the significance of that gift?
Connection	Connection	Связь	Connection
Clarity	Clarity	Ясность	Clarity
Confidence	Confidence	Уверенность	Confidence
Curiosity	Curiosity	Любопытство	Curiosity
Courage	Courage	Храбрость	Courage

Exercise 3: Create a U-Turn Statement	Exercise 3: Create a U-Turn Statement	Упражнение 3. Создайте заявление о развороте	Exercise 3: Create a U-Turn Statement
Use the eight qualities of Self to create a U-turn statement to remind you to go inside when you become activated by people, situations, and life circumstances. Below is my U-turn statement.	Use the eight qualities of Self to create a U-turn statement to remind you to go inside when you become activated by people, situations, and life circumstances. Below is my U-turn statement.	Используйте восемь качеств «Я», чтобы создать заявление о развороте, которое будет напоминать вам о необходимости идти внутрь себя, когда вас активируют люди, ситуации и жизненные обстоятельства. Ниже мое заявление о развороте.	Use the eight qualities of Self to create a U-turn statement to remind you to go inside when you become activated by people, situations, and life circumstances. Below is my U-turn statement.
I am Confident that there are Creative ways to Connect inside to witness my parts with Clarity, while remaining Calm and being Courageous enough to stay Curious when my parts get activated, remembering that a little Compassion goes a long way.	I am Confident that there are Creative ways to Connect inside to witness my parts with Clarity, while remaining Calm and being Courageous enough to stay Curious when my parts get activated, remembering that a little Compassion goes a long way.	Я Уверен, что существуют Творческие способы Соединиться внутри, чтобы с Ясностью наблюдать за своими частями, оставаясь при этом Спокойным и достаточно Смелым, чтобы оставаться Любопытным, когда мои части активируются, помня, что немного Сострадания имеет большое значение.	I am Confident that there are Creative ways to Connect inside to witness my parts with Clarity, while remaining Calm and being Courageous enough to stay Curious when my parts get activated, remembering that a little Compassion goes a long way.
CHAPTER 14	CHAPTER 14	ГЛАВА 14	CHAPTER 14
Still Listening	Still Listening	Все еще слушаю	Still Listening
What happens after unburdening and healing the wounds of the past? We become less reactive to people and situations that previously triggered and activated our parts. One of my core childhood wounds was connected to rejection. A part of me felt rejected when my grandmother and aunts would not validate my experience by telling me the truth about the return address on the letter from my father. My feelings of rejection were further validated when I returned home from Louisiana to the truth of my parents’ impending divorce. At nine years old I had a close bond with my father, and a part of me believed divorce meant a rejection of me and a loss of my connection with him. The feelings of rejection gained a stronger hold as life unfolded with my father’s remarriage to a woman who had a child who got to live with him full-time, followed by the birth of their child, my younger brother. The part of me that felt rejected was exiled for over 40 years, and the reactivity of my raging protectors kept my father and me in a relationship that moved on a continuum from strained to estrangement for 11 years in my early adulthood.	What happens after unburdening and healing the wounds of the past? We become less reactive to people and situations that previously triggered and activated our parts. One of my core childhood wounds was connected to rejection. A part of me felt rejected when my grandmother and aunts would not validate my experience by telling me the truth about the return address on the letter from my father. My feelings of rejection were further validated when I returned home from Louisiana to the truth of my parents’ impending divorce. At nine years old I had a close bond with my father, and a part of me believed divorce meant a rejection of me and a loss of my connection with him. The feelings of rejection gained a stronger hold as life unfolded with my father’s remarriage to a woman who had a child who got to live with him full-time, followed by the birth of their child, my younger brother. The part of me that felt rejected was exiled for over 40 years, and the reactivity of my raging protectors kept my father and me in a relationship that moved on a continuum from strained to estrangement for 11 years in my early adulthood.	Что происходит после освобождения и исцеления ран прошлого? Мы становимся менее реагирующими на людей и ситуации, которые раньше запускали и активировали наши части. Одна из моих основных детских ран была связана с отвержением. Часть меня чувствовала себя отвергнутой, когда моя бабушка и тети не подтвердили мой опыт, сказав мне правду об обратном адресе в письме от моего отца. Мое чувство отвержения еще больше подтвердилось, когда я вернулся домой из Луизианы и узнал правду о предстоящем разводе моих родителей. В девять лет у меня была тесная связь с отцом, и часть меня считала, что развод означает отказ от меня и потерю связи с ним. Чувство отвержения усилилось по мере того, как жизнь разворачивалась после повторного брака моего отца с женщиной, у которой был ребенок, который должен был жить с ним постоянно, после чего у них родился ребенок, мой младший брат. Та часть меня, которая чувствовала себя отвергнутой, была изгнана более чем на 40 лет, а реакция моих яростных защитников удерживала нас с отцом в отношениях, которые в течение 11 лет моего раннего взросления развивались от натянутости к отчуждению.	What happens after unburdening and healing the wounds of the past? We become less reactive to people and situations that previously triggered and activated our parts. One of my core childhood wounds was connected to rejection. A part of me felt rejected when my grandmother and aunts would not validate my experience by telling me the truth about the return address on the letter from my father. My feelings of rejection were further validated when I returned home from Louisiana to the truth of my parents’ impending divorce. At nine years old I had a close bond with my father, and a part of me believed divorce meant a rejection of me and a loss of my connection with him. The feelings of rejection gained a stronger hold as life unfolded with my father’s remarriage to a woman who had a child who got to live with him full-time, followed by the birth of their child, my younger brother. The part of me that felt rejected was exiled for over 40 years, and the reactivity of my raging protectors kept my father and me in a relationship that moved on a continuum from strained to estrangement for 11 years in my early adulthood.
For over 20 years I sought help through therapy, personal development workshops, retreats, and self-help books to heal this core wound of rejection. When I took the IFS Level 1 training, I had the opportunity to work with the parts of myself that felt both rage and rejection, and from that one demonstration session I knew IFS offered a level of healing that I had not experienced personally or seen professionally in my work with clients. I continued my IFS healing journey, and after unburdening each of my parts, protectors, and exiles who held the rage and feelings of rejection, I was able to engage with my father with no reactivity or triggering. Additionally, these parts were no longer triggered by other people and situations that reminded them of, or were similar to, my relationship with my father. In nine sessions, I received the elusive healing I had sought for decades.	For over 20 years I sought help through therapy, personal development workshops, retreats, and self-help books to heal this core wound of rejection. When I took the IFS Level 1 training, I had the opportunity to work with the parts of myself that felt both rage and rejection, and from that one demonstration session I knew IFS offered a level of healing that I had not experienced personally or seen professionally in my work with clients. I continued my IFS healing journey, and after unburdening each of my parts, protectors, and exiles who held the rage and feelings of rejection, I was able to engage with my father with no reactivity or triggering. Additionally, these parts were no longer triggered by other people and situations that reminded them of, or were similar to, my relationship with my father. In nine sessions, I received the elusive healing I had sought for decades.	Более 20 лет я искал помощи в терапии, семинарах по личностному развитию, ретритах и ​​книгах самопомощи, чтобы залечить эту глубокую рану отвержения. Когда я прошел тренинг IFS Уровня 1, у меня была возможность поработать с теми частями себя, которые чувствовали как ярость, так и отвержение, и из этого одного демонстрационного сеанса я понял, что IFS предлагает уровень исцеления, которого я не испытывал лично или не видел профессионально. в моей работе с клиентами. Я продолжил свой путь исцеления IFS, и после освобождения каждой из моих частей, защитников и изгнанников, которые сдерживали ярость и чувство отвержения, я смог взаимодействовать со своим отцом без какой-либо реакции или триггера. Кроме того, эти части больше не вызывались другими людьми и ситуациями, которые напоминали им или были похожи на мои отношения с отцом. За девять сеансов я получил неуловимое исцеление, которого искал десятилетиями.	For over 20 years I sought help through therapy, personal development workshops, retreats, and self-help books to heal this core wound of rejection. When I took the IFS Level 1 training, I had the opportunity to work with the parts of myself that felt both rage and rejection, and from that one demonstration session I knew IFS offered a level of healing that I had not experienced personally or seen professionally in my work with clients. I continued my IFS healing journey, and after unburdening each of my parts, protectors, and exiles who held the rage and feelings of rejection, I was able to engage with my father with no reactivity or triggering. Additionally, these parts were no longer triggered by other people and situations that reminded them of, or were similar to, my relationship with my father. In nine sessions, I received the elusive healing I had sought for decades.
However, my healing journey did not end with the parts that felt rage and rejection. I continued to discover other parts that held extreme beliefs. It seemed the more I worked with my system, the more willing parts were to come to the fore to receive the healing they witnessed other parts receiving.	However, my healing journey did not end with the parts that felt rage and rejection. I continued to discover other parts that held extreme beliefs. It seemed the more I worked with my system, the more willing parts were to come to the fore to receive the healing they witnessed other parts receiving.	Однако мой путь исцеления не закончился на тех частях тела, которые ощущали гнев и отвержение. Я продолжал обнаруживать другие части тела, которые придерживались крайних убеждений. Казалось, что чем больше я работал со своей системой, тем больше желающих частей выходило на передний план, чтобы получить исцеление, свидетелями которого были другие части.	However, my healing journey did not end with the parts that felt rage and rejection. I continued to discover other parts that held extreme beliefs. It seemed the more I worked with my system, the more willing parts were to come to the fore to receive the healing they witnessed other parts receiving.
This was most evident as I rose in leadership within the IFS Institute. I am the first Black person and person of color to enter the trainer track and be promoted to solo lead trainer. Being the first Black woman in a leadership role in an all-white organization activated distrusting, fearful, striving, and sad parts. Parts distrusted that the Institute would be true to their new stated mission of creating more inclusion and equity. Fearful parts were afraid I would be a tokenized checkbox for diversity. When the Institute put their mission into action by actively recruiting and training future leaders from the Global Majority and LGBTQIA+ communities, I had striving parts who wanted to be a good role model to those coming into the organization after me. Lastly, I had sad parts who were painfully familiar with blazing a trail alone with no road map as the first or only Black woman in a role.	This was most evident as I rose in leadership within the IFS Institute. I am the first Black person and person of color to enter the trainer track and be promoted to solo lead trainer. Being the first Black woman in a leadership role in an all-white organization activated distrusting, fearful, striving, and sad parts. Parts distrusted that the Institute would be true to their new stated mission of creating more inclusion and equity. Fearful parts were afraid I would be a tokenized checkbox for diversity. When the Institute put their mission into action by actively recruiting and training future leaders from the Global Majority and LGBTQIA+ communities, I had striving parts who wanted to be a good role model to those coming into the organization after me. Lastly, I had sad parts who were painfully familiar with blazing a trail alone with no road map as the first or only Black woman in a role.	Это стало наиболее очевидным, когда я поднялся на руководящую должность в Институте IFS. Я первый чернокожий и цветной человек, который вошел в тренерскую программу и получил повышение до сольного ведущего тренера. То, что она стала первой чернокожей женщиной на руководящей роли в организации, состоящей исключительно из белых, активизировало недоверчивые, боязливые, стремящиеся и грустные части. Партс не верил, что Институт будет верен своей новой заявленной миссии по обеспечению большей инклюзивности и равенства. Напуганные части боялись, что я стану символическим флажком разнообразия. Когда Институт реализовал свою миссию, активно набирая и обучая будущих лидеров из сообществ глобального большинства и ЛГБТКИА+, во мне были стремящиеся части, которые хотели быть хорошим примером для подражания для тех, кто придет в организацию после меня. Наконец, у меня были печальные роли, которым до боли знакомо прокладывать путь в одиночку, без дорожной карты, в качестве первой или единственной чернокожей женщины в роли.	This was most evident as I rose in leadership within the IFS Institute. I am the first Black person and person of color to enter the trainer track and be promoted to solo lead trainer. Being the first Black woman in a leadership role in an all-white organization activated distrusting, fearful, striving, and sad parts. Parts distrusted that the Institute would be true to their new stated mission of creating more inclusion and equity. Fearful parts were afraid I would be a tokenized checkbox for diversity. When the Institute put their mission into action by actively recruiting and training future leaders from the Global Majority and LGBTQIA+ communities, I had striving parts who wanted to be a good role model to those coming into the organization after me. Lastly, I had sad parts who were painfully familiar with blazing a trail alone with no road map as the first or only Black woman in a role.
I was committed to using the model to help me become a better leader and trainer. So each time a situation activated the parts I’ve just mentioned and I reached a point where I could not resolve the reactivity on my own, I went back to my highly skilled IFS therapist. This happened several times during the five years when I was taking on successive and expansive roles in leadership. Self wanted to bring healing to every part of me that was open to it. With each part that was healed, reactivity in my system decreased, while the expression of Self-energy increased. The increased access to Self-energy encouraged other parts of me to trust Self and the healing process. By the time I was in the training I described in the beginning of Chapter 4, I had immediate and reliable access to Self because of the relationship, trust, and connection with my parts.	I was committed to using the model to help me become a better leader and trainer. So each time a situation activated the parts I’ve just mentioned and I reached a point where I could not resolve the reactivity on my own, I went back to my highly skilled IFS therapist. This happened several times during the five years when I was taking on successive and expansive roles in leadership. Self wanted to bring healing to every part of me that was open to it. With each part that was healed, reactivity in my system decreased, while the expression of Self-energy increased. The increased access to Self-energy encouraged other parts of me to trust Self and the healing process. By the time I was in the training I described in the beginning of Chapter 4, I had immediate and reliable access to Self because of the relationship, trust, and connection with my parts.	Я был полон решимости использовать эту модель, чтобы помочь мне стать лучшим лидером и тренером. Поэтому каждый раз, когда ситуация активировала части, которые я только что упомянул, и я достигал точки, когда я не мог самостоятельно справиться с реактивностью, я возвращался к своему высококвалифицированному терапевту IFS. Это случалось несколько раз за те пять лет, когда я последовательно и широко исполнял руководящие роли. «Я» хотел исцелить каждую часть меня, которая была открыта для этого. С каждой исцелённой частью реактивность моей системы уменьшалась, в то время как выражение собственной энергии возрастало. Расширение доступа к энергии «Я» побудило другие части меня доверять «Я» и процессу исцеления. К тому времени, когда я проходил обучение, описанное в начале главы 4, у меня был немедленный и надежный доступ к Я благодаря отношениям, доверию и связи с моими частями.	I was committed to using the model to help me become a better leader and trainer. So each time a situation activated the parts I’ve just mentioned and I reached a point where I could not resolve the reactivity on my own, I went back to my highly skilled IFS therapist. This happened several times during the five years when I was taking on successive and expansive roles in leadership. Self wanted to bring healing to every part of me that was open to it. With each part that was healed, reactivity in my system decreased, while the expression of Self-energy increased. The increased access to Self-energy encouraged other parts of me to trust Self and the healing process. By the time I was in the training I described in the beginning of Chapter 4, I had immediate and reliable access to Self because of the relationship, trust, and connection with my parts.
PARTS STILL GET ACTIVATED	PARTS STILL GET ACTIVATED	ЧАСТИ ЕЩЕ АКТИВИРУЮТСЯ	PARTS STILL GET ACTIVATED
Working with and getting to know our internal system is an ongoing process. As we befriend, witness, and unburden parts, the system shifts. The increased trust and shifting opens us to deeper healing, uncovering new parts that want and need attention or parts we previously unburdened that need deeper healing. Either way, we still will get triggered or activated. Why does this happen? Well, we are not capable of being always Self-led. It would be akin to being in bliss or Nirvana constantly. But I have found that activation shows me where I have work to do. It points to the parts of me that need connection and healing. Admittedly, some of the work, especially with core wounds, deep trauma, and persistently distrustful parts can be difficult to do alone. Refer to the Resource section at the end of the book to locate additional resources and support.	Working with and getting to know our internal system is an ongoing process. As we befriend, witness, and unburden parts, the system shifts. The increased trust and shifting opens us to deeper healing, uncovering new parts that want and need attention or parts we previously unburdened that need deeper healing. Either way, we still will get triggered or activated. Why does this happen? Well, we are not capable of being always Self-led. It would be akin to being in bliss or Nirvana constantly. But I have found that activation shows me where I have work to do. It points to the parts of me that need connection and healing. Admittedly, some of the work, especially with core wounds, deep trauma, and persistently distrustful parts can be difficult to do alone. Refer to the Resource section at the end of the book to locate additional resources and support.	Работа с нашей внутренней системой и ее изучение — это непрерывный процесс. По мере того, как мы дружим, свидетельствуем и освобождаем части от бремени, система меняется. Возросшее доверие и перемены открывают нам путь к более глубокому исцелению, открывая новые части, которые хотят и нуждаются во внимании, или части, которые мы ранее обременили и которые нуждаются в более глубоком исцелении. В любом случае, мы все равно будем срабатывать или активироваться. Почему это происходит? Что ж, мы не способны всегда быть самостоятельными. Это было бы похоже на постоянное пребывание в блаженстве или нирване. Но я обнаружил, что активация показывает мне, где мне есть над чем работать. Это указывает на те части меня, которые нуждаются в соединении и исцелении. Следует признать, что некоторые работы, особенно с глубокими ранениями, глубокими травмами и постоянно вызывающими недоверие частями тела, может быть трудно выполнить в одиночку. Обратитесь к разделу «Ресурсы» в конце книги, чтобы найти дополнительные ресурсы и поддержку.	Working with and getting to know our internal system is an ongoing process. As we befriend, witness, and unburden parts, the system shifts. The increased trust and shifting opens us to deeper healing, uncovering new parts that want and need attention or parts we previously unburdened that need deeper healing. Either way, we still will get triggered or activated. Why does this happen? Well, we are not capable of being always Self-led. It would be akin to being in bliss or Nirvana constantly. But I have found that activation shows me where I have work to do. It points to the parts of me that need connection and healing. Admittedly, some of the work, especially with core wounds, deep trauma, and persistently distrustful parts can be difficult to do alone. Refer to the Resource section at the end of the book to locate additional resources and support.
GOALS OF PARTS WORK	GOALS OF PARTS WORK	ЦЕЛИ РАБОТЫ ЧАСТЕЙ	GOALS OF PARTS WORK
I shared the goals of IFS therapy in Chapter 1, and I’ll repeat them here. The goals of IFS therapy are to liberate parts from their extreme roles, restore Self-leadership, create balance and harmony within the system, and bring Self-energy to the external world.1 Let’s look at how reaching each of these goals results in a Self-led life.	I shared the goals of IFS therapy in Chapter 1, and I’ll repeat them here. The goals of IFS therapy are to liberate parts from their extreme roles, restore Self-leadership, create balance and harmony within the system, and bring Self-energy to the external world.1 Let’s look at how reaching each of these goals results in a Self-led life.	Я рассказал о целях терапии IFS в главе 1 и повторю их здесь. Цели терапии IFS — освободить части от их экстремальных ролей, восстановить Самолидерство, создать баланс и гармонию внутри системы и принести энергию Самости во внешний мир.1 Давайте посмотрим, как достижение каждой из этих целей приводит к Самостоятельная жизнь.	I shared the goals of IFS therapy in Chapter 1, and I’ll repeat them here. The goals of IFS therapy are to liberate parts from their extreme roles, restore Self-leadership, create balance and harmony within the system, and bring Self-energy to the external world.1 Let’s look at how reaching each of these goals results in a Self-led life.
Although I came to IFS first as a therapist and learner, then later as a therapy client, IFS is a guiding principle for my life. Now that my parts have an awareness and relationship with me and know they are not alone, they trust me to lead. However, their trust was earned. It was through listening to and validating their experiences that their confidence in Self increased. As parts released their burdens and embraced their gifts, the entire system has access to these natural gifts. I have fewer polarizations inside, which increases balance and a willingness for parts to work together, which in turn increases harmony. My parts welcome their roles as advisors and supporters who no longer have the burden of acting, feeling, and holding beliefs contrary to their innate nature. My parts readily unblend and allow for the U-turn when they get activated. As I’ve mentioned, I believe the U-turn is one of the most beneficial tools in IFS. The process of unblending with the knowledge that I am available and willing to be with their experiences has been life changing and life giving in my system. It gives my parts space to pause and let me (Self) address the cause of their activation. I have learned that more than anything, my parts want acknowledgment and validation. They often need calming, as I have some excitable parts. My experience has been that no matter what my parts require, Self can and will provide it. IFS has transformed the ways I interact and engage with people, situations, and conflict both internally and in the world. I am present in ways I couldn’t be before coming into a relationship with and healing parts of myself who had either no awareness or trust of Self.	Although I came to IFS first as a therapist and learner, then later as a therapy client, IFS is a guiding principle for my life. Now that my parts have an awareness and relationship with me and know they are not alone, they trust me to lead. However, their trust was earned. It was through listening to and validating their experiences that their confidence in Self increased. As parts released their burdens and embraced their gifts, the entire system has access to these natural gifts. I have fewer polarizations inside, which increases balance and a willingness for parts to work together, which in turn increases harmony. My parts welcome their roles as advisors and supporters who no longer have the burden of acting, feeling, and holding beliefs contrary to their innate nature. My parts readily unblend and allow for the U-turn when they get activated. As I’ve mentioned, I believe the U-turn is one of the most beneficial tools in IFS. The process of unblending with the knowledge that I am available and willing to be with their experiences has been life changing and life giving in my system. It gives my parts space to pause and let me (Self) address the cause of their activation. I have learned that more than anything, my parts want acknowledgment and validation. They often need calming, as I have some excitable parts. My experience has been that no matter what my parts require, Self can and will provide it. IFS has transformed the ways I interact and engage with people, situations, and conflict both internally and in the world. I am present in ways I couldn’t be before coming into a relationship with and healing parts of myself who had either no awareness or trust of Self.	Хотя я пришел в IFS сначала как терапевт и ученик, а затем как клиент терапии, IFS является руководящим принципом в моей жизни. Теперь, когда мои части осознали и установили отношения со мной и знают, что они не одиноки, они доверяют мне лидерство. Однако их доверие было заслужено. Именно благодаря выслушиванию и подтверждению их опыта их уверенность в себе возросла. Когда части освободились от своего бремени и приняли свои дары, вся система получила доступ к этим естественным дарам. У меня внутри меньше поляризаций, что увеличивает баланс и готовность частей работать вместе, что, в свою очередь, увеличивает гармонию. Мои части приветствуют их роль советников и сторонников, которые больше не несут бремя действий, чувств и убеждений, противоречащих их врожденной природе. Мои части легко разъединяются и допускают разворот, когда их активируют. Как я уже упоминал, я считаю, что разворот — один из самых полезных инструментов в IFS. Процесс расставания со знанием того, что я доступен и готов быть с их опытом, изменил жизнь и дал жизнь моей системе. Это дает моим частям возможность сделать паузу и позволить мне (Самому) устранить причину их активации. Я понял, что больше всего мои части нуждаются в признании и подтверждении. Их часто нужно успокоить, так как у меня есть некоторые возбудимые части. Мой опыт показывает, что независимо от того, чего требуют мои части, «Я» может и предоставит это. IFS изменила способы моего взаимодействия и взаимодействия с людьми, ситуациями и конфликтами как внутри страны, так и в мире. Я присутствую так, как не мог быть до того, как вступил в отношения и исцелил те части себя, которые не имели ни осознания, ни доверия к Себе.	Although I came to IFS first as a therapist and learner, then later as a therapy client, IFS is a guiding principle for my life. Now that my parts have an awareness and relationship with me and know they are not alone, they trust me to lead. However, their trust was earned. It was through listening to and validating their experiences that their confidence in Self increased. As parts released their burdens and embraced their gifts, the entire system has access to these natural gifts. I have fewer polarizations inside, which increases balance and a willingness for parts to work together, which in turn increases harmony. My parts welcome their roles as advisors and supporters who no longer have the burden of acting, feeling, and holding beliefs contrary to their innate nature. My parts readily unblend and allow for the U-turn when they get activated. As I’ve mentioned, I believe the U-turn is one of the most beneficial tools in IFS. The process of unblending with the knowledge that I am available and willing to be with their experiences has been life changing and life giving in my system. It gives my parts space to pause and let me (Self) address the cause of their activation. I have learned that more than anything, my parts want acknowledgment and validation. They often need calming, as I have some excitable parts. My experience has been that no matter what my parts require, Self can and will provide it. IFS has transformed the ways I interact and engage with people, situations, and conflict both internally and in the world. I am present in ways I couldn’t be before coming into a relationship with and healing parts of myself who had either no awareness or trust of Self.
BENEFITS OF PARTS WORK	BENEFITS OF PARTS WORK	ПРЕИМУЩЕСТВА РАБОТЫ С ЗАПЧАСТЯМИ	BENEFITS OF PARTS WORK
As you have met, befriended, and even healed some of your parts, I hope you have already experienced the benefits of parts work. In working with our parts, we are not adding or gaining anything new; we are uncovering and increasing access to what we already possess. Below are nine benefits of parts work I have experienced and/or my clients have shared. I hope that you will also experience these benefits of your work.	As you have met, befriended, and even healed some of your parts, I hope you have already experienced the benefits of parts work. In working with our parts, we are not adding or gaining anything new; we are uncovering and increasing access to what we already possess. Below are nine benefits of parts work I have experienced and/or my clients have shared. I hope that you will also experience these benefits of your work.	Поскольку вы познакомились, подружились и даже исцелили некоторые свои части, я надеюсь, что вы уже ощутили преимущества работы с частями. Работая с нашими частями, мы не добавляем и не приобретаем ничего нового; мы открываем и расширяем доступ к тому, чем уже обладаем. Ниже приведены девять преимуществ работы с запчастями, с которыми я столкнулся и/или о которых рассказали мои клиенты. Я надеюсь, что вы также ощутите эти преимущества своей работы.	As you have met, befriended, and even healed some of your parts, I hope you have already experienced the benefits of parts work. In working with our parts, we are not adding or gaining anything new; we are uncovering and increasing access to what we already possess. Below are nine benefits of parts work I have experienced and/or my clients have shared. I hope that you will also experience these benefits of your work.
Less parts reactivity: Parts become calmer when they have a relationship with Self and experience unburdening.	Less parts reactivity: Parts become calmer when they have a relationship with Self and experience unburdening.	Меньше реактивности частей: части становятся спокойнее, когда они вступают в отношения с «Я» и испытывают освобождение от бремени.	Less parts reactivity: Parts become calmer when they have a relationship with Self and experience unburdening.
Greater choice: In their extreme states, parts have little to no awareness of other options beyond what they are currently doing. After unburdening, they have greater access to choose because they are free of their extreme roles and have access to their natural gifts.	Greater choice: In their extreme states, parts have little to no awareness of other options beyond what they are currently doing. After unburdening, they have greater access to choose because they are free of their extreme roles and have access to their natural gifts.	Больший выбор: в своих крайних состояниях части практически не осознают других вариантов, кроме того, что они делают в данный момент. После освобождения от бремени у них появляется больше возможностей выбора, поскольку они свободны от своих крайних ролей и имеют доступ к своим природным дарам.	Greater choice: In their extreme states, parts have little to no awareness of other options beyond what they are currently doing. After unburdening, they have greater access to choose because they are free of their extreme roles and have access to their natural gifts.
Parts as advisors: The system has access to the wisdom of its parts. They can have an active role, if they choose, in moving the system forward emotionally, physically, professionally, interpersonally, and in many other ways.	Parts as advisors: The system has access to the wisdom of its parts. They can have an active role, if they choose, in moving the system forward emotionally, physically, professionally, interpersonally, and in many other ways.	Части как советники. Система имеет доступ к мудрости своих частей. Они могут играть активную роль, если захотят, в продвижении системы вперед эмоционально, физически, профессионально, межличностно и многими другими способами.	Parts as advisors: The system has access to the wisdom of its parts. They can have an active role, if they choose, in moving the system forward emotionally, physically, professionally, interpersonally, and in many other ways.
Improved relationships: With less reactivity, increased choice, and parts in new validating roles, relationships with other people improve. Parts can bring their positive qualities to relationships.	Improved relationships: With less reactivity, increased choice, and parts in new validating roles, relationships with other people improve. Parts can bring their positive qualities to relationships.	Улучшение отношений: благодаря уменьшению реактивности, расширению выбора и участию в новых проверяющих ролях отношения с другими людьми улучшаются. Части могут привнести в отношения свои положительные качества.	Improved relationships: With less reactivity, increased choice, and parts in new validating roles, relationships with other people improve. Parts can bring their positive qualities to relationships.
Trust in Self: Parts trust Self to lead the system and to assist them when they get activated because they have a firsthand experience of Self and the qualities that can help them transform.	Trust in Self: Parts trust Self to lead the system and to assist them when they get activated because they have a firsthand experience of Self and the qualities that can help them transform.	Доверие к Себе: Части доверяют Себе вести систему и помогать ей, когда она активируется, потому что у них есть непосредственный опыт Самости и качеств, которые могут помочь им трансформироваться.	Trust in Self: Parts trust Self to lead the system and to assist them when they get activated because they have a firsthand experience of Self and the qualities that can help them transform.
Depersonalize behavior of others: We accept that everyone has parts, which means the poor behavior or mistreatment by others is not personal. We can see their parts in action.	Depersonalize behavior of others: We accept that everyone has parts, which means the poor behavior or mistreatment by others is not personal. We can see their parts in action.	Деперсонализируйте поведение других: мы признаем, что у каждого есть части, а это означает, что плохое поведение или плохое обращение со стороны других не являются личными. Мы можем увидеть их части в действии.	Depersonalize behavior of others: We accept that everyone has parts, which means the poor behavior or mistreatment by others is not personal. We can see their parts in action.
Increased access to Self: The healing process naturally increases access to Self. As parts release burdens and extreme roles, they have more access to Self.	Increased access to Self: The healing process naturally increases access to Self. As parts release burdens and extreme roles, they have more access to Self.	Расширение доступа к себе. Процесс исцеления естественным образом увеличивает доступ к себе. По мере того, как части освобождаются от бремени и экстремальных ролей, они получают больше доступа к «Я».	Increased access to Self: The healing process naturally increases access to Self. As parts release burdens and extreme roles, they have more access to Self.
Grounded and present: With the release of extreme roles, the system is experienced as grounded and present.	Grounded and present: With the release of extreme roles, the system is experienced as grounded and present.	Заземленная и присутствующая: с освобождением крайних ролей система воспринимается как заземленная и присутствующая.	Grounded and present: With the release of extreme roles, the system is experienced as grounded and present.
Embodiment: The experience of feeling more “like yourself” or “present in your body” or “comfortable in your body.” Also, a physical experience of the positive qualities parts express with the release of their burdens.	Embodiment: The experience of feeling more “like yourself” or “present in your body” or “comfortable in your body.” Also, a physical experience of the positive qualities parts express with the release of their burdens.	Воплощение: ощущение себя более «самым собой», «присутствующим в своем теле» или «комфортным в своем теле». Кроме того, физический опыт частей положительных качеств выражается в освобождении от их бремени.	Embodiment: The experience of feeling more “like yourself” or “present in your body” or “comfortable in your body.” Also, a physical experience of the positive qualities parts express with the release of their burdens.
YOUR LISTENING JOURNEY	YOUR LISTENING JOURNEY	ВАШ ПУТЕШЕСТВИЕ ПРОСЛУШИВАНИЯ	YOUR LISTENING JOURNEY
I have found that working with my parts and being in relationship with my ancestors is an ongoing process. I am committed to a long-term relationship with both. I continue to nurture these relationships, encouraging them to grow and deepen. Over time, the relationship with my parts has become more trusting, meaningful, and valuable. I have grown to lean in to the wisdom and guidance of my ancestors, especially when life doesn’t seem to make sense. I appreciate their loving care for me and what is important to me, as shown in how they lovingly led me through many of the meditations shared here.	I have found that working with my parts and being in relationship with my ancestors is an ongoing process. I am committed to a long-term relationship with both. I continue to nurture these relationships, encouraging them to grow and deepen. Over time, the relationship with my parts has become more trusting, meaningful, and valuable. I have grown to lean in to the wisdom and guidance of my ancestors, especially when life doesn’t seem to make sense. I appreciate their loving care for me and what is important to me, as shown in how they lovingly led me through many of the meditations shared here.	Я обнаружил, что работа со своими частями тела и отношения с моими предками — это непрерывный процесс. Я настроен на долгосрочные отношения с обоими. Я продолжаю развивать эти отношения, поощряя их расти и углубляться. Со временем отношения с моими частями стали более доверительными, значимыми и ценными. Я научился полагаться на мудрость и руководство своих предков, особенно когда жизнь кажется не имеющей смысла. Я ценю их любящую заботу обо мне и о том, что для меня важно, о чем свидетельствует то, как они с любовью провели меня через многие из представленных здесь медитаций.	I have found that working with my parts and being in relationship with my ancestors is an ongoing process. I am committed to a long-term relationship with both. I continue to nurture these relationships, encouraging them to grow and deepen. Over time, the relationship with my parts has become more trusting, meaningful, and valuable. I have grown to lean in to the wisdom and guidance of my ancestors, especially when life doesn’t seem to make sense. I appreciate their loving care for me and what is important to me, as shown in how they lovingly led me through many of the meditations shared here.
This book has been created as a joint project between me and the Writing Clan of my mother’s mother’s ancestral line. It has changed how I experience myself, the world, and how I interact with others. I have learned through this process that my ancestors are always present and available to me as I am for my parts. We, me, my parts, and my ancestors move through life connected and interrelated, no longer isolated and alone. I wish the same for you.	This book has been created as a joint project between me and the Writing Clan of my mother’s mother’s ancestral line. It has changed how I experience myself, the world, and how I interact with others. I have learned through this process that my ancestors are always present and available to me as I am for my parts. We, me, my parts, and my ancestors move through life connected and interrelated, no longer isolated and alone. I wish the same for you.	Эта книга создана как совместный проект меня и Писающего клана по материнской линии моей матери. Это изменило то, как я ощущаю себя, мир и то, как я взаимодействую с другими. Благодаря этому процессу я узнал, что мои предки всегда присутствуют и доступны мне, как и я со своей стороны. Мы, я, мои части и мои предки движемся по жизни связанными и взаимосвязанными, больше не изолированными и одинокими. Я желаю тебе того же.	This book has been created as a joint project between me and the Writing Clan of my mother’s mother’s ancestral line. It has changed how I experience myself, the world, and how I interact with others. I have learned through this process that my ancestors are always present and available to me as I am for my parts. We, me, my parts, and my ancestors move through life connected and interrelated, no longer isolated and alone. I wish the same for you.
I encourage you to continue your healing journey by expanding and deepening your relationship with your parts and ancestors. Two key resources to assist you are locating an IFS therapist/practitioner and an Ancestral Lineage Healing practitioner. In addition to these resources, you’ll find other unique and useful resources in the pages ahead.	I encourage you to continue your healing journey by expanding and deepening your relationship with your parts and ancestors. Two key resources to assist you are locating an IFS therapist/practitioner and an Ancestral Lineage Healing practitioner. In addition to these resources, you’ll find other unique and useful resources in the pages ahead.	Я призываю вас продолжить путь исцеления, расширяя и углубляя отношения со своими частями тела и предками. Два ключевых ресурса, которые помогут вам, — это найти терапевта/практика IFS и практикующего целителя по линии предков. Помимо этих ресурсов, на последующих страницах вы найдете другие уникальные и полезные ресурсы.	I encourage you to continue your healing journey by expanding and deepening your relationship with your parts and ancestors. Two key resources to assist you are locating an IFS therapist/practitioner and an Ancestral Lineage Healing practitioner. In addition to these resources, you’ll find other unique and useful resources in the pages ahead.

Podcasts	Podcasts	Подкасты	Podcasts
Brown Girls Don’t Do Therapy	Brown Girls Don’t Do Therapy	Коричневые девушки не проходят терапию	Brown Girls Don’t Do Therapy
www.instagram.com/browngirlsdontdotherapypodcast/	www.instagram.com/browngirlsdontdotherapypodcast/	www.instagram.com/browngirlsdontdotherapypodcast/	www.instagram.com/browngirlsdontdotherapypodcast/
A podcast designed by a brown girl who happens to be a therapist to educate, empower, and support listeners to reconnect with their authentic selves. It explores how internal family systems (IFS) therapy or “parts work” can support people to find peace, harmony, and love in their life. This podcast is born from the need to break down the continued stigma of going to therapy in many BIPOC communities, and normalize that mental health is health. The host, Diviya Lewis, is a Registered Psychotherapist in Canada and a Certified IFS Therapist.	A podcast designed by a brown girl who happens to be a therapist to educate, empower, and support listeners to reconnect with their authentic selves. It explores how internal family systems (IFS) therapy or “parts work” can support people to find peace, harmony, and love in their life. This podcast is born from the need to break down the continued stigma of going to therapy in many BIPOC communities, and normalize that mental health is health. The host, Diviya Lewis, is a Registered Psychotherapist in Canada and a Certified IFS Therapist.	Подкаст, созданный смуглой девушкой, которая работает терапевтом, чтобы обучать, расширять возможности и поддерживать слушателей в воссоединении со своей подлинной сущностью. В нем исследуется, как терапия внутренних семейных систем (IFS), или «работа частей», может помочь людям обрести мир, гармонию и любовь в своей жизни. Этот подкаст родился из необходимости разрушить сохраняющуюся стигму обращения к терапии во многих сообществах BIPOC и нормализовать представление о том, что психическое здоровье — это здоровье. Ведущая, Дивия Льюис, является зарегистрированным психотерапевтом в Канаде и сертифицированным терапевтом IFS.	A podcast designed by a brown girl who happens to be a therapist to educate, empower, and support listeners to reconnect with their authentic selves. It explores how internal family systems (IFS) therapy or “parts work” can support people to find peace, harmony, and love in their life. This podcast is born from the need to break down the continued stigma of going to therapy in many BIPOC communities, and normalize that mental health is health. The host, Diviya Lewis, is a Registered Psychotherapist in Canada and a Certified IFS Therapist.
The One Inside: An Internal Family Systems https://podcasts.apple.com/au/podcast/the-one-inside-an-internal-family-systems-ifs-podcast/id1460334766	The One Inside: An Internal Family Systems https://podcasts.apple.com/au/podcast/the-one-inside-an-internal-family-systems-ifs-podcast/id1460334766	Тот, кто внутри: внутренние семейные системы https://podcasts.apple.com/au/podcast/the-one-inside-an-internal-family-systems-ifs-podcast/id1460334766	The One Inside: An Internal Family Systems https://podcasts.apple.com/au/podcast/the-one-inside-an-internal-family-systems-ifs-podcast/id1460334766
The One Inside: An Internal Family Systems podcast is for anyone looking to find balance and harmony. IFS can help you understand the tug-of-war within your mind and rediscover your natural calm, creativity, and clarity. IFS can also heal the parts of you who hold pain.	The One Inside: An Internal Family Systems podcast is for anyone looking to find balance and harmony. IFS can help you understand the tug-of-war within your mind and rediscover your natural calm, creativity, and clarity. IFS can also heal the parts of you who hold pain.	Подкаст The One Inside: Внутренние семейные системы предназначен для всех, кто хочет найти баланс и гармонию. IFS может помочь вам понять перетягивание каната в вашем уме и заново открыть для себя естественное спокойствие, креативность и ясность ума. IFS также может исцелить те части вашего тела, которые испытывают боль.	The One Inside: An Internal Family Systems podcast is for anyone looking to find balance and harmony. IFS can help you understand the tug-of-war within your mind and rediscover your natural calm, creativity, and clarity. IFS can also heal the parts of you who hold pain.
IFS Talks	IFS Talks	Переговоры IFS	IFS Talks

IFS Talks is an audio series to deepen connections with the Internal Family Systems Model through conversations with lead trainers, authors, practitioners, and users.	IFS Talks is an audio series to deepen connections with the Internal Family Systems Model through conversations with lead trainers, authors, practitioners, and users. IFS Talks is an audio series to deepen connections with the Internal Family Systems Model through conversations with lead trainers, authors, practitioners, and users.
