Glossary	Glossary	Глоссарий	Glossary
Ancestral lineage healing: A specific ritualized way to connect with wise ancestors to heal intergenerational trauma and reclaim and embody centuries of lost ancestral wisdom and guidance.	Ancestral lineage healing: A specific ritualized way to connect with wise ancestors to heal intergenerational trauma and reclaim and embody centuries of lost ancestral wisdom and guidance.	Исцеление родословной: особый ритуальный способ связи с мудрыми предками, чтобы исцелить травмы, перенесенные из поколения в поколение, а также вернуть и воплотить столетия утраченной мудрости и руководства предков.	Ancestral lineage healing: A specific ritualized way to connect with wise ancestors to heal intergenerational trauma and reclaim and embody centuries of lost ancestral wisdom and guidance.
Befriending: Extending Self-energy to connect with a part to create a Self-to-part relationship and get to know the part.	Befriending: Extending Self-energy to connect with a part to create a Self-to-part relationship and get to know the part.	Дружба: расширение энергии «Я» для соединения с частью, создания отношений «Я-часть» и знакомства с этой частью.	Befriending: Extending Self-energy to connect with a part to create a Self-to-part relationship and get to know the part.
Blending: When the feelings, beliefs, and energies of a part are in the seat of consciousness and block access to Self.	Blending: When the feelings, beliefs, and energies of a part are in the seat of consciousness and block access to Self.	Смешение: когда чувства, убеждения и энергии части находятся в центре сознания и блокируют доступ к «Я».	Blending: When the feelings, beliefs, and energies of a part are in the seat of consciousness and block access to Self.
Burden: The extreme beliefs, thoughts, and perspectives parts take on because of trauma, attachment injury, and devaluing experiences.	Burden: The extreme beliefs, thoughts, and perspectives parts take on because of trauma, attachment injury, and devaluing experiences.	Бремя: крайние убеждения, мысли и точки зрения возникают из-за травм, травм привязанности и обесценивающего опыта.	Burden: The extreme beliefs, thoughts, and perspectives parts take on because of trauma, attachment injury, and devaluing experiences.
Cultural burden: Negative beliefs, emotions, and energies of parts absorbed through interactions with the dominant culture and/or society.	Cultural burden: Negative beliefs, emotions, and energies of parts absorbed through interactions with the dominant culture and/or society.	Культурное бремя: Негативные убеждения, эмоции и энергии частей, поглощенные взаимодействием с доминирующей культурой и/или обществом.	Cultural burden: Negative beliefs, emotions, and energies of parts absorbed through interactions with the dominant culture and/or society.
Direct Access: Creating a Self-to-part relationship between the Self of another, usually an IFS therapist or practitioner, and your parts. Parts remain blended.	Direct Access: Creating a Self-to-part relationship between the Self of another, usually an IFS therapist or practitioner, and your parts. Parts remain blended.	Прямой доступ: создание отношений «Я-часть» между «Я» другого человека, обычно терапевта или практикующего специалиста IFS, и вашими частями. Части остаются смешанными.	Direct Access: Creating a Self-to-part relationship between the Self of another, usually an IFS therapist or practitioner, and your parts. Parts remain blended.
Do-over: A reworking of a traumatic experience in the presence of a compassionate witness. Also referred to as an emotionally corrective experience.	Do-over: A reworking of a traumatic experience in the presence of a compassionate witness. Also referred to as an emotionally corrective experience.	Повтор: переработка травматического опыта в присутствии сострадательного свидетеля. Также называется эмоционально корректирующим опытом.	Do-over: A reworking of a traumatic experience in the presence of a compassionate witness. Also referred to as an emotionally corrective experience.
Exile: Typically, a young part who has experienced trauma and is kept out of awareness for fear that their pain will overwhelm the system.	Exile: Typically, a young part who has experienced trauma and is kept out of awareness for fear that their pain will overwhelm the system.	Изгнанник: Как правило, молодая часть, которая пережила травму и находится в неведении из-за страха, что их боль сокрушит систему.	Exile: Typically, a young part who has experienced trauma and is kept out of awareness for fear that their pain will overwhelm the system.
Fears: Identifying and addressing the fears of parts that impede relationship building and/or healing.	Fears: Identifying and addressing the fears of parts that impede relationship building and/or healing.	Страхи: выявление и устранение страхов тех частей, которые мешают построению и/или исцелению отношений.	Fears: Identifying and addressing the fears of parts that impede relationship building and/or healing.
Feel Toward: Noticing how you feel toward the part.	Feel Toward: Noticing how you feel toward the part.	Чувствовать себя: обращать внимание на то, как вы себя чувствуете по отношению к этой роли.	Feel Toward: Noticing how you feel toward the part.
Find: Going inside to notice the part in or around your body.	Find: Going inside to notice the part in or around your body.	Находка: Загляните внутрь и обратите внимание на часть тела внутри или вокруг него.	Find: Going inside to notice the part in or around your body.
Firefighter: A part who responds in extreme reactive ways when the pain of exiled parts is expressed or experienced by the system.	Firefighter: A part who responds in extreme reactive ways when the pain of exiled parts is expressed or experienced by the system.	Пожарный: Часть, которая крайне реактивно реагирует, когда система выражает или испытывает боль изгнанных частей.	Firefighter: A part who responds in extreme reactive ways when the pain of exiled parts is expressed or experienced by the system.
Flesh Out: Deepening the Self-to-part relationship with the part by extending increased Self-energy (the qualities of Self) and learning what the part wants to share about itself.	Flesh Out: Deepening the Self-to-part relationship with the part by extending increased Self-energy (the qualities of Self) and learning what the part wants to share about itself.	Выявление плоти: углубление отношений «Я-часть» с частью путем увеличения энергии «Я» (качеств «Я») и изучения того, чем часть хочет поделиться о себе.	Flesh Out: Deepening the Self-to-part relationship with the part by extending increased Self-energy (the qualities of Self) and learning what the part wants to share about itself.
Focus: After finding the part, bringing awareness to the part to see what more you notice or experience.	Focus: After finding the part, bringing awareness to the part to see what more you notice or experience.	Фокус: после обнаружения части сосредоточьте внимание на этой части, чтобы увидеть, что еще вы замечаете или испытываете.	Focus: After finding the part, bringing awareness to the part to see what more you notice or experience.
Going inside: A turning of attention from the external to your inner world. This can involve closing your eyes, softening your gaze, looking downward, or simply sitting quietly and noticing what’s happening inside of you.	Going inside: A turning of attention from the external to your inner world. This can involve closing your eyes, softening your gaze, looking downward, or simply sitting quietly and noticing what’s happening inside of you.	Вход внутрь: переключение внимания с внешнего на свой внутренний мир. Это может включать в себя закрытие глаз, смягчение взгляда, взгляд вниз или просто тихое сидение и наблюдение за тем, что происходит внутри вас.	Going inside: A turning of attention from the external to your inner world. This can involve closing your eyes, softening your gaze, looking downward, or simply sitting quietly and noticing what’s happening inside of you.
In-sight: Creating a Self-to-part relationship between your Self and your parts. This requires the part to unblend or separate from Self.	In-sight: Creating a Self-to-part relationship between your Self and your parts. This requires the part to unblend or separate from Self.	Прозрение: создание отношений «Я-части» между вашим «Я» и вашими частями. Это требует, чтобы часть разделилась или отделилась от «Я».	In-sight: Creating a Self-to-part relationship between your Self and your parts. This requires the part to unblend or separate from Self.
Integration: The reorganization of the internal system to accommodate the new roles of parts after unburdening.	Integration: The reorganization of the internal system to accommodate the new roles of parts after unburdening.	Интеграция: реорганизация внутренней системы для соответствия новым функциям частей после разгрузки.	Integration: The reorganization of the internal system to accommodate the new roles of parts after unburdening.
Intention: Commitments made between Self and parts to continue their relationship after an unburdening.	Intention: Commitments made between Self and parts to continue their relationship after an unburdening.	Намерение: обязательства между «Я» и частями продолжать отношения после освобождения от бремени.	Intention: Commitments made between Self and parts to continue their relationship after an unburdening.
Internal Family Systems Therapy: A model of psychotherapy that holds that everyone has parts and a wise Self capable of healing and guiding your internal family of parts.	Internal Family Systems Therapy: A model of psychotherapy that holds that everyone has parts and a wise Self capable of healing and guiding your internal family of parts.	Внутренняя семейная системная терапия: модель психотерапии, которая утверждает, что у каждого есть части и мудрое Я, способное исцелять и направлять вашу внутреннюю семью, состоящую из частей.	Internal Family Systems Therapy: A model of psychotherapy that holds that everyone has parts and a wise Self capable of healing and guiding your internal family of parts.
Invitation: Inviting essential qualities that were lost or obscured because of the burden the part carried prior to unburdening.	Invitation: Inviting essential qualities that were lost or obscured because of the burden the part carried prior to unburdening.	Приглашение: приглашение существенных качеств, которые были потеряны или скрыты из-за бремени, которое эта часть несла до освобождения.	Invitation: Inviting essential qualities that were lost or obscured because of the burden the part carried prior to unburdening.
Legacy burden: Negative beliefs, emotions, and energies of parts passed down through familial and ancestral lines.	Legacy burden: Negative beliefs, emotions, and energies of parts passed down through familial and ancestral lines.	Бремя наследия: негативные убеждения, эмоции и энергии частей, передаваемые по семейным и наследственным линиям.	Legacy burden: Negative beliefs, emotions, and energies of parts passed down through familial and ancestral lines.
Legacy gift: Positive qualities of parts passed down through familial and ancestral lines. Also known as legacy heirlooms.	Legacy gift: Positive qualities of parts passed down through familial and ancestral lines. Also known as legacy heirlooms.	Дар наследия: Положительные качества частей, передаваемые по семейным и наследственным линиям. Также известны как наследственные реликвии.	Legacy gift: Positive qualities of parts passed down through familial and ancestral lines. Also known as legacy heirlooms.
Manager: A part who responds in extreme proactive ways to keep you from experiencing the pain of exiled parts.	Manager: A part who responds in extreme proactive ways to keep you from experiencing the pain of exiled parts.	Менеджер: Часть, которая реагирует крайне активно, чтобы вы не испытывали боль изгнанных частей.	Manager: A part who responds in extreme proactive ways to keep you from experiencing the pain of exiled parts.
Part: A subpersonality you were born with who has feelings, thoughts, sensations, memories, speech, and many other qualities.	Part: A subpersonality you were born with who has feelings, thoughts, sensations, memories, speech, and many other qualities.	Часть: Субличность, с которой вы родились, обладающая чувствами, мыслями, ощущениями, воспоминаниями, речью и многими другими качествами.	Part: A subpersonality you were born with who has feelings, thoughts, sensations, memories, speech, and many other qualities.
Personal burden: Negative beliefs, emotions, and energies of parts taken on because of their own traumatic and/or devaluing experiences.	Personal burden: Negative beliefs, emotions, and energies of parts taken on because of their own traumatic and/or devaluing experiences.	Личное бремя: Негативные убеждения, эмоции и энергии частей, возникшие из-за их собственного травмирующего и/или обесценивающего опыта.	Personal burden: Negative beliefs, emotions, and energies of parts taken on because of their own traumatic and/or devaluing experiences.
Polarization: A relationship between two or more parts holding opposing views, beliefs, and behaviors.	Polarization: A relationship between two or more parts holding opposing views, beliefs, and behaviors.	Поляризация: отношения между двумя или более частями, придерживающимися противоположных взглядов, убеждений и поведения.	Polarization: A relationship between two or more parts holding opposing views, beliefs, and behaviors.
Protector parts: Parts who have been forced into extreme roles to protect you and other parts due to trauma and/or devaluing life experiences.	Protector parts: Parts who have been forced into extreme roles to protect you and other parts due to trauma and/or devaluing life experiences.	Части-защитники: Части, которые были вынуждены играть экстремальную роль, чтобы защитить вас и другие части из-за травмы и/или обесценивания жизненного опыта.	Protector parts: Parts who have been forced into extreme roles to protect you and other parts due to trauma and/or devaluing life experiences.
Retrieval: An offer to bring a stuck or frozen exiled part out of a past trauma scene to a safe place of its choice.	Retrieval: An offer to bring a stuck or frozen exiled part out of a past trauma scene to a safe place of its choice.	Возврат: предложение перенести застрявшую или замороженную изгнанную часть из места прошлой травмы в безопасное место по ее выбору.	Retrieval: An offer to bring a stuck or frozen exiled part out of a past trauma scene to a safe place of its choice.
Self: It is who you are when you are unblended from extreme parts. It is unaffected by past traumas, and it can heal them.	Self: It is who you are when you are unblended from extreme parts. It is unaffected by past traumas, and it can heal them.	Я: Это то, кем вы являетесь, когда вы отделены от крайностей. На него не влияют прошлые травмы, и он может их исцелить.	Self: It is who you are when you are unblended from extreme parts. It is unaffected by past traumas, and it can heal them.
Self-leadership: When Self is in the seat of consciousness leading the system with wisdom, compassion, and intuition.	Self-leadership: When Self is in the seat of consciousness leading the system with wisdom, compassion, and intuition.	Самолидерство: когда «Я» находится на месте сознания, руководя системой с мудростью, состраданием и интуицией.	Self-leadership: When Self is in the seat of consciousness leading the system with wisdom, compassion, and intuition.
Self-like part: Manager parts who possess qualities like Self. They are empathic rather than compassionate and do not have the ability to heal the system.	Self-like part: Manager parts who possess qualities like Self. They are empathic rather than compassionate and do not have the ability to heal the system.	Самоподобная часть: Части менеджера, обладающие такими качествами, как «Я». Они скорее эмпатичны, чем сострадательны, и не обладают способностью исцелять систему.	Self-like part: Manager parts who possess qualities like Self. They are empathic rather than compassionate and do not have the ability to heal the system.
Unblending: The process of a part separating from Self.	Unblending: The process of a part separating from Self.	Растворение: процесс отделения части от себя.	Unblending: The process of a part separating from Self.
Unburdening: The process by which exiles and protectors release their burdens.	Unburdening: The process by which exiles and protectors release their burdens.	Освобождение: процесс, посредством которого изгнанники и защитники снимают свое бремя.	Unburdening: The process by which exiles and protectors release their burdens.
Updating: Sharing with parts what has happened in your life since the time where they are stuck or frozen.	Updating: Sharing with parts what has happened in your life since the time where they are stuck or frozen.	Обновление: поделитесь с частями тем, что произошло в вашей жизни с тех пор, как они застряли или застыли.	Updating: Sharing with parts what has happened in your life since the time where they are stuck or frozen.
U-turn: The pause to notice what is happening inside when activated and allowing space to unblend.	U-turn: The pause to notice what is happening inside when activated and allowing space to unblend.	Разворот: пауза, позволяющая заметить, что происходит внутри, при активации и позволить пространству раствориться.	U-turn: The pause to notice what is happening inside when activated and allowing space to unblend.
Witnessing: The beginning of the healing process for exiles, where they tell their story to a compassionate, curious, calm, and connected listener and witness.	Witnessing: The beginning of the healing process for exiles, where they tell their story to a compassionate, curious, calm, and connected listener and witness.	Свидетельствование: начало процесса исцеления изгнанников, когда они рассказывают свою историю сострадательному, любопытному, спокойному и связанному слушателю и свидетелю.	Witnessing: The beginning of the healing process for exiles, where they tell their story to a compassionate, curious, calm, and connected listener and witness.

The most important person I want to thank is my husband, Ernest Floyd, for taking this amazing journey with me. I would have been lost without his tech-savvy support—ensuring adequate Internet speed, recommending and updating various applications, filming and editing my marketing video, supporting my vision, and loving my many parts who showed up along the way. He gave me the space I required to write and made sure we had plenty of fun, lightheartedness, and adventure too.	The most important person I want to thank is my husband, Ernest Floyd, for taking this amazing journey with me. I would have been lost without his tech-savvy support—ensuring adequate Internet speed, recommending and updating various applications, filming and editing my marketing video, supporting my vision, and loving my many parts who showed up along the way. He gave me the space I required to write and made sure we had plenty of fun, lightheartedness, and adventure too.	Самый важный человек, которого я хочу поблагодарить, — это мой муж Эрнест Флойд за то, что он отправился со мной в это удивительное путешествие. Я был бы потерян без его технически подкованной поддержки — обеспечения адекватной скорости Интернета, рекомендаций и обновлений различных приложений, съемок и редактирования моего маркетингового видео, поддержки моего видения и любви ко многим моим частям, которые появлялись на этом пути. Он дал мне необходимое пространство для написания и позаботился о том, чтобы мы получили массу удовольствия, беззаботности и приключений.	The most important person I want to thank is my husband, Ernest Floyd, for taking this amazing journey with me. I would have been lost without his tech-savvy support—ensuring adequate Internet speed, recommending and updating various applications, filming and editing my marketing video, supporting my vision, and loving my many parts who showed up along the way. He gave me the space I required to write and made sure we had plenty of fun, lightheartedness, and adventure too.
Thank you to Dr. Richard Schwartz for creating the IFS model and generously sharing it with the world, even in times of challenge and doubt. I am grateful to Dr. Schwartz for encouraging my desire to become an IFS trainer and author and supporting my growth, through his teachings and by working with my system and parts. I also appreciate his words of encouragement to deepen my relationships with my ancestors. I also appreciate his words of encouragement to deepen my relationships with my ancestors. Я благодарен доктору Шварцу за то, что он поддержал мое желание стать тренером и автором IFS и поддержал мой рост посредством его учений и работы с моей системой и ее частями. Я также ценю его слова поддержки, направленные на углубление моих отношений с моими предками. Я хочу выразить признательность трем старшим ведущим тренерам IFS, которые направляли, обучали и поддерживали мой процесс: Крису Беррису, LMFT; Памела Краузе, LCSW; и Энн Синко, LMFT.	I want to acknowledge three IFS senior lead trainers who guided, taught, and supported my process: Chris Burris, LMFT; Pamela Krause, LCSW; and Ann Sinko, LMFT.
Chris Burris greatly impacted my development as an IFS solo lead trainer. He mentored me in such a generous fashion, sharing his knowledge and experience while highlighting my strengths and providing tools and suggestions for my growing edges. From the beginning, Chris supported my idea of writing a book about IFS and including ancestor-inspired meditations. He was invaluable in my understanding and application of the model and translating that knowledge into this book.	Chris Burris greatly impacted my development as an IFS solo lead trainer. He mentored me in such a generous fashion, sharing his knowledge and experience while highlighting my strengths and providing tools and suggestions for my growing edges. From the beginning, Chris supported my idea of writing a book about IFS and including ancestor-inspired meditations. He was invaluable in my understanding and application of the model and translating that knowledge into this book.	Крис Беррис сильно повлиял на мое развитие как индивидуального ведущего тренера IFS. Он щедро наставлял меня, делясь своими знаниями и опытом, подчеркивая мои сильные стороны и предоставляя инструменты и предложения для моего роста. С самого начала Крис поддержал мою идею написать книгу об IFS и включить в нее медитации, вдохновленные предками. Он оказал неоценимую помощь в моем понимании и применении модели, а также в воплощении этих знаний в этой книге.	Chris Burris greatly impacted my development as an IFS solo lead trainer. He mentored me in such a generous fashion, sharing his knowledge and experience while highlighting my strengths and providing tools and suggestions for my growing edges. From the beginning, Chris supported my idea of writing a book about IFS and including ancestor-inspired meditations. He was invaluable in my understanding and application of the model and translating that knowledge into this book.
Pam Krause is a gem of a teacher and friend. During the mentoring process and beyond, I have been so fortunate to benefit from her 20-plus years of experience. Pam helped me truly embrace the qualities of Self that I witnessed her exemplify—especially her unmatched gift of speaking for her parts. Pam’s willingness to share her vulnerability gave my parts not only permission but a road map for expressing themselves. Under Pam’s guidance I learned the powerful healing effect of Self-energy.	Pam Krause is a gem of a teacher and friend. During the mentoring process and beyond, I have been so fortunate to benefit from her 20-plus years of experience. Pam helped me truly embrace the qualities of Self that I witnessed her exemplify—especially her unmatched gift of speaking for her parts. Pam’s willingness to share her vulnerability gave my parts not only permission but a road map for expressing themselves. Under Pam’s guidance I learned the powerful healing effect of Self-energy.	Пэм Краузе – настоящий учитель и друг. В процессе наставничества и за его пределами мне посчастливилось воспользоваться ее более чем 20-летним опытом. Пэм помогла мне по-настоящему осознать те качества личности, которые, как я был свидетелем, она демонстрировала, особенно ее непревзойденный дар говорить от своего имени. Готовность Пэм поделиться своей уязвимостью дала моим частям не только разрешение, но и дорожную карту для самовыражения. Под руководством Пэм я узнал мощный целебный эффект Самоэнергии.	Pam Krause is a gem of a teacher and friend. During the mentoring process and beyond, I have been so fortunate to benefit from her 20-plus years of experience. Pam helped me truly embrace the qualities of Self that I witnessed her exemplify—especially her unmatched gift of speaking for her parts. Pam’s willingness to share her vulnerability gave my parts not only permission but a road map for expressing themselves. Under Pam’s guidance I learned the powerful healing effect of Self-energy.
I am grateful to Ann Sinko for her contribution to expanding my understanding of legacy burdens and the gift of ancestor work with IFS. As one of my mentors, Ann helped me learn the nuances of the model. Once I understood the model, she helped me appreciate its intricacies, which broadened and deepened my experience with IFS.	I am grateful to Ann Sinko for her contribution to expanding my understanding of legacy burdens and the gift of ancestor work with IFS. As one of my mentors, Ann helped me learn the nuances of the model. Once I understood the model, she helped me appreciate its intricacies, which broadened and deepened my experience with IFS.	Я благодарен Энн Синко за ее вклад в расширение моего понимания бремени наследия и дар работы предков с IFS. Будучи одним из моих наставников, Анна помогла мне изучить нюансы модели. Как только я понял модель, она помогла мне оценить ее тонкости, что расширило и углубило мой опыт работы с IFS.	I am grateful to Ann Sinko for her contribution to expanding my understanding of legacy burdens and the gift of ancestor work with IFS. As one of my mentors, Ann helped me learn the nuances of the model. Once I understood the model, she helped me appreciate its intricacies, which broadened and deepened my experience with IFS.
I want to thank the entire Hay House publishing team who assisted in bringing this book forth. I am most grateful to Anne Barthel, Executive Editor, the woman who journeyed the entire distance with me. As a new writer, Anne was exactly the editor I needed, because she made sure I understood the process at every single step. Most importantly, she had a way of delivering corrective feedback that didn’t activate my critical, perfectionist parts. I am immensely grateful for the many thoughtful suggestions she made to improve my writing. I learned from Anne that writers write and editors edit. I’m grateful for our partnership and how beautifully she edited my work.	I want to thank the entire Hay House publishing team who assisted in bringing this book forth. I am most grateful to Anne Barthel, Executive Editor, the woman who journeyed the entire distance with me. As a new writer, Anne was exactly the editor I needed, because she made sure I understood the process at every single step. Most importantly, she had a way of delivering corrective feedback that didn’t activate my critical, perfectionist parts. I am immensely grateful for the many thoughtful suggestions she made to improve my writing. I learned from Anne that writers write and editors edit. I’m grateful for our partnership and how beautifully she edited my work.	Я хочу поблагодарить всю издательскую команду Hay House, которая помогла выпустить эту книгу. Я очень благодарен Анне Бартель, исполнительному редактору, женщине, которая проделала со мной весь путь. Как новый писатель, Энн была именно тем редактором, который мне был нужен, потому что она следила за тем, чтобы я понимал процесс на каждом этапе. Самое главное, у нее был способ давать корректирующую обратную связь, которая не активизировала мои критические, перфекционистские стороны. Я безмерно благодарен ей за множество вдумчивых предложений по улучшению моего письма. От Анны я узнала, что писатели пишут, а редакторы редактируют. Я благодарен за наше сотрудничество и за то, как прекрасно она отредактировала мою работу.	I want to thank the entire Hay House publishing team who assisted in bringing this book forth. I am most grateful to Anne Barthel, Executive Editor, the woman who journeyed the entire distance with me. As a new writer, Anne was exactly the editor I needed, because she made sure I understood the process at every single step. Most importantly, she had a way of delivering corrective feedback that didn’t activate my critical, perfectionist parts. I am immensely grateful for the many thoughtful suggestions she made to improve my writing. I learned from Anne that writers write and editors edit. I’m grateful for our partnership and how beautifully she edited my work.
Thank you, Devon Glenn, for improving the readability of my work with your copyediting. Simple changes made a world of difference. I’m glad to be the beneficiary of your talent.	Thank you, Devon Glenn, for improving the readability of my work with your copyediting. Simple changes made a world of difference. I’m glad to be the beneficiary of your talent.	Спасибо, Девон Гленн, за улучшение читабельности моей работы благодаря вашему редактированию. Простые изменения изменили мир. Я рад быть бенефициаром вашего таланта.	Thank you, Devon Glenn, for improving the readability of my work with your copyediting. Simple changes made a world of difference. I’m glad to be the beneficiary of your talent.
Monica O’Connor, who assisted Anne, asked great questions that expanded my ideas for the book and clarified concepts for readers new to IFS.	Monica O’Connor, who assisted Anne, asked great questions that expanded my ideas for the book and clarified concepts for readers new to IFS.	Моника О’Коннор, которая помогала Анне, задала замечательные вопросы, которые расширили мои идеи относительно книги и разъяснили концепции для читателей, впервые знакомых с IFS.	Monica O’Connor, who assisted Anne, asked great questions that expanded my ideas for the book and clarified concepts for readers new to IFS.
I am grateful to Allison Janice, senior acquisitions editor, who first reviewed my meditation audio proposal. When we met, she simply asked if I’d be open to writing a book and expanding on the audio idea. Thank you, Allison, for asking the question that honored my ancestors’ intentions and opened the way for Listening When Parts Speak. When we met, she simply asked if I’d be open to writing a book and expanding on the audio idea. Thank you, Allison, for asking the question that honored my ancestors’ intentions and opened the way for Listening When Parts Speak.	Я благодарен Эллисон Дженис, старшему редактору отдела закупок, которая первой рассмотрела мое предложение по аудиомедитации. Когда мы встретились, она просто спросила, готов ли я написать книгу и расширить идею аудио. Спасибо, Эллисон, за вопрос, который отдал дань уважения намерениям моих предков и открыл путь к способности «Слушать, когда говорят части».	I am grateful to Allison Janice, senior acquisitions editor, who first reviewed my meditation audio proposal. When we met, she simply asked if I’d be open to writing a book and expanding on the audio idea. Thank you, Allison, for asking the question that honored my ancestors’ intentions and opened the way for Listening When Parts Speak.
About the Author	About the Author	Об авторе	About the Author
TAMALA FLOYD, LCSW, is a psychotherapist, IFS lead trainer, consultant, author, and speaker with over 25 years of experience. She received a master’s degree in social work from the University of Southern California and an undergraduate degree in psychology from California State University–Long Beach. She has taught at the University of Phoenix and the University of Southern California in human services and social work. Her work focuses on women’s trauma, mothering, and relationship issues, helping women identify and heal emotional wounds that impede their success and coaching them in achieving fulfilling life goals.	TAMALA FLOYD, LCSW, is a psychotherapist, IFS lead trainer, consultant, author, and speaker with over 25 years of experience. She received a master’s degree in social work from the University of Southern California and an undergraduate degree in psychology from California State University–Long Beach. She has taught at the University of Phoenix and the University of Southern California in human services and social work. Her work focuses on women’s trauma, mothering, and relationship issues, helping women identify and heal emotional wounds that impede their success and coaching them in achieving fulfilling life goals.	ТАМАЛА ФЛОЙД, LCSW, — психотерапевт, ведущий тренер IFS, консультант, автор и оратор с более чем 25-летним опытом. Она получила степень магистра социальной работы в Университете Южной Калифорнии и степень бакалавра психологии в Университете штата Калифорния в Лонг-Бич. Она преподавала в Университете Финикса и Университете Южной Калифорнии в области социальных услуг и социальной работы. Ее работа сосредоточена на женских травмах, материнстве и проблемах взаимоотношений, помогая женщинам выявить и залечить эмоциональные раны, которые мешают их успеху, и обучает их достижению жизненных целей.	TAMALA FLOYD, LCSW, is a psychotherapist, IFS lead trainer, consultant, author, and speaker with over 25 years of experience. She received a master’s degree in social work from the University of Southern California and an undergraduate degree in psychology from California State University–Long Beach. She has taught at the University of Phoenix and the University of Southern California in human services and social work. Her work focuses on women’s trauma, mothering, and relationship issues, helping women identify and heal emotional wounds that impede their success and coaching them in achieving fulfilling life goals.
